What are you doing here? {nl} Go into the mines quickly. {nl} Weren't we supposed to meet in 1st Gallery?
No demons would be able to cross here.{nl}I will do my best to protect here so they can't interrupt the 聖騎士 導師.
Firm faith in us is the greatest shield.{nl}We always fought with our justice and faith.
Well done.{nl}As the 聖騎士 導師， I salute to your accomplishment.
Guard Hames
We should do anything to protect here from those demons.{nl}This land is divine.
I would have fled long time ago if it wasn't for that pledge.{nl}I am still the son of the great guard.
We should somehow block those demons.{nl}I can't pass this danger to our brothers in the cathedral.
We can't go in due to the barrier.{nl}To open the door， we should go through 1層 of the basement.
When I meet you again， is this world going to be peaceful.. I hope it is.
I never expected those demons will come down this far.{nl}I hope our brothers stand still against them.
We have lots of things to protect so we should rather defeat those demons quietly than excitng them.{nl}I feel much more safe with you.
Honestly， I thought it would be hard to stand still with only 聖騎士s.{nl}I guess my belief in them wasn't that much.
It will be better to fight them face to face instead of hiding.{nl}It will be even better if the opponents are the demons.
So humans can also defeat the demon king.{nl}I can't believe it.
Too bad that Gesti wasn't killed， but still you did a great job.{nl}It will end soon..
You fought hard.{nl}May the 女神 bless you in the future.
Let's pay more attention to the safety of our people here.{nl}Where is the maid of Jonas?
When I focus on the research， I sometimes don't know even when the monsters come.{nl}To think back about that moment， it is still frightening.
Take a look around you from the next time.{nl}I almost got involved in it.
I thought I remember almost everything.{nl}I guess I have alzheimer. I can't remember the face of the guy who I used to work with.
There's a guy who I used to work with.{nl}I just can't remember his face.
We don't have time to waste here.
Thanks for helping me last time.{nl}All I have are the research materials. I don't know why the monsters are after them.
I've done a wrongful thing to Niels.{nl}I remember everything now. I feel embarassed.
Security Guard
The artifacts you discover here can't go out from here.{nl}Even if you are the revelator.
This is the place where lots of scholars are doing their researches so please do not make loud sounds.
When suppliers are lacking， merchants like me are more needed.{nl}That's the way of this world.
Why are monsters taking these.{nl}At least， it is fortunate that we still have this much materials.
This is the first time I've been at a dangerous place like this.{nl}This place is so deserted so I have no idea why monsters are here.
Gorath
There are many people went missing. Where is this guy?
Badat

Stonemason Pipoti

결정석을 가지고 부러진 기둥 협곡의 구스타스의 제자들을 찾아주세요.{nl}봉인에 대해 가르쳐 드릴 겁니다.
Kevin

Sculptor Hilda

They are not only beautiful， but they also have writings on them.{nl}Maybe we should read them sometimes.
The reason why this isolated canyon is beautiful is because it keeps a secret somewhere.
Our family's first mission has been just achieved.{nl}Now is the start.
Supply Commander Vio
Today is quiet.{nl}I am talking about those monsters.
We are veterans.{nl}After all those years at mercenary， we should not be confused even if we haven't heard anything in years.

Morcus Jonas

How come no one remembers it.{nl}The man with silver hair.. he..
An unknown event that is being plotted by an unknown person..{nl}This is really scary..
Now is the time to concentrate on the research， but I can't concentrate at all.{nl}Also where is my assistant..
Without Irene， I would have died.{nl}Of course， I really appreciate for your help.
Irene saved my life.{nl}And you also saved my life.
I heard the story but I can't really believe it. {nl} Getting rid of the 瓦布戰士.
Where is the scholar. I am really worried.
Without Dezik， I would have probably gone crazy within those monsters.{nl}Of course， thank you so much for your help as well.
We are about to leave here， what's the matter?{nl}I haven't heard that we would receive reinforcements.
We should leave here soon.{nl}No one knows which stone will bring which monsters.{nl}Why is this happening..
Do you think it makes sense that we should leave because the archeologists are not valuable anymore?{nl}There are artifacts everywhere on this land!!
I think my guess won't be wrong. Something is happening.{nl}I can't give up.
The thing I want should be here， but I just can't find a way to find it.{nl}Hmm. What shoud I do.
My heart is breaking to leave a great place like this.{nl}But， we don't have a choice.
Do you think I am crazy to stay here longer?{nl}I am gonna leave here as quickly as possible. See you next time!
Historian Cyrenia Odell
This feeling..{nl}Is it the feeling of an historian， or the fear that comes from human instinct..
Adventurer Vakis
Explorer? Of course it is not dangerous. {nl} However， Guchi~ari~tsu when you discover something is guided in a row this day.
Historian Rexipher
There's an old saying.{nl}A person who fights against beasts should be careful not to be a beast himself.{nl}When you look at the abyss for a long time， the abyss will also look at you..{nl}
I have a feeling that I would meet you again.{nl}Farewell until then..

I should have returned quietly after advising those historians.{nl}This is all my fault.
Liaison Officer Bail

Historian Colin
Well， I don't know anything.{nl}Hmm..not at all.

Wounded Historian Laulas

Everything is my fault.{nl}Smid is dead.. what should I alone.

If we let Sequoia act like now， all owls will be destroyed.{nl}Many people will die as well...{nl}There will be full of wandering spirits and we won't have any owls to guide us.{nl}
Sequoia is too late.{nl}They are not only attacking humans， but they also attack us who used to be it's old friends!{nl}
The memory of Sequoia and us together.. was it weaker than the vicious power?
Grave Protector Owl Sculpture
Thanks for saving me.{nl}I don't understand how I got attacked by those little things.{nl}Maybe I am too old now.
It seems that the Guide Owl finally made a decision.{nl}It once tried hard to bring Sequoia back to the way it used to before..{nl}
Anyways， It's good.{nl}I need the Essence of Spirit from the spirit that is wandering around the grave of unknown warrior.{nl}You can do anything， just bring us the Essence.
The spirits that were wandering for a long time are like monsters.

Wow， you collected those Essences.{nl}When you go back to the Guide Owl， it will empower your weapon with the power of spirits.{nl}I am not sure if that will result in a positive outcome..Only 女神 will know.

It is a personal matter， but there is an angry owl at Cross Hill near here.{nl}But， after it fell into a deep sleep due to an incident， it is obsessed with evil power.{nl}Please wake up that angry owl and persuade it to gain it's conciousness again.{nl}
If it doesn't listen to you..{nl}Then just destroy it and let it go to the 女神.
I will do anything to bring it back to it's normal status.
This is the symbol of the Guide Owl which guided his spirit.{nl}When it sleeps for a long time， it gets influenced by monsters.{nl}Lot's of it's colleagues changed like that.{nl}
I am sorry. Let me be alone for a while.
So you brought the power of spirits.{nl}I will inject the power of spirits into your stick.{nl}The stick with lots of spirits' power like this will be able to destroy Sequoia.
You must succeed.{nl}If you think about those owls that were eaten by Sequoia or burnt into deaths， you must succeed this time.
What?{nl}Sequoia ran away alive?{nl}
That's a big problem!{nl}Desperate Owl is there..
It is my mistake. I thought it too easy. {nl}I didn't know this would happen. {nl}If Desperate Owl gets destroyed， then I..{nl}
Please..{nl}Please help Desperate Owl. {nl}
Desperate Owl Sculpture
It was very scary.{nl}Thanks for saving me.{nl}But， it seems that Sequoia is going crazier than usual so I feel relief..{nl}
Anyways， it seems that Sequoia when to Desperate Owl.{nl}I hope nothing happens..
I saw Sequoia was very angry and going crazy.{nl}I never saw Sequoia doing that before. We are going to be destroyed by it!{nl}So please help us!{nl}
Try everything we can.{nl}I need the blackened boughs.{nl}I will string them together and make a stronger stick.
Sequoia destroyed one of my friends， burnt this forest， and..{nl}
We basically have kind minds..{nl}I will curse Sequoia even at the moment that I fall into deep sleep.
This will be enough.{nl}It will be better if I could string my anger into it as well.
I made a stick with the curse from the blackend wood branches that you brought.{nl}Sequoia must be still near here.{nl}Please stab Sequoia using this.
Sequoia will swallow us and absorb more spirits' energy.{nl}At one time， he was our friend..{nl}But we forgot those days.
It's good to see the forest in burning in flames.{nl}It's okay. It's not surprising anymore.{nl}The day when the Sequoia was possessed with vicious energy was worse than this.
I hope the owls don't feel dissappointed due to their failure.{nl}Sequioia wasn't defeated， but that doesn't mean the stick had failed.{nl}Especially the last two blows must have been fatal to it.
However， if we let Sequoia act like that， it will burn the whole forest in flames.{nl}It will recover itself by swallowing us.{nl}Please destroy Sequoia now.
The scream from Sequoia is echoing even in my body.{nl}It wouldn't be difficult to defeat him now.{nl}You don't have time to waste anymore anyways.
You defeated Sequoia.{nl}It was once our protector， but it's death was cruel.{nl}The way we think about Sequoia.. You would never understand.
There are some purifying devices that doesn't activate right away. {nl}I've put in a guide for it so you just have to follow that.
在克萊佩達下方有購物廣場。 {nl} 停下來看看你是否需要什麼東西。
I just want him to run away far. {nl}Nah， in fact， I don't know. He was a really good friend of me..
Okay.{nl}Please find the Grave Protector Owl from the grave of the unknown warrior.{nl}If he could lend us his power， it will be a good chance to defeat Sequioa.
Believer Adele
Thorny vines are also plants so they must be weak to strong mountain.{nl}What do you think? Isn't it a good idea?
Filibo?{nl}I wouldn't worry if it only steals food.{nl}
It bites on any wooden materials on military equipments and it also breaks medicine jars.{nl}It makes holes to tents.{nl}And it is not afraid of anything. It attacks people.
Ha! Now I am relieved!{nl}The materials and the tents have come and the equipments and supplies would come soon..{nl}Then we should just wait for carts.. carts? carts?!!{nl}
Ah， I forgot about carts!{nl}I am sorry， but can you request carts to Pakelas?{nl}I can go myself， but I think I am gonna get scolded again.. Haha..
Adjutant General Pakelas
Ah， You must the tat famous.. Oh..It's so good to see you.{nl}Why have you come here?{nl}
Ah， carts..damn. Malt forgot them again..{nl}We have extra carts， but they need to be fixed so I should first check them.
Please check their status.{nl}Those soldiers should check them， so I am sorry..{nl}I will scold Bran.
What?{nl}These are the only carts that can function normally?
Damn. The materials and the equipments should come..{nl}Since I just can't wait， I should get some stems of Harming in the meantime.{nl}I feel dizzy already..
How should I scold Malt?
That's enough!{nl}I feel sorry to you.
Then， Can you help me?{nl}Please get some toe nails from Velwritgglers at Rajuma Crooked Road.
Our revelator is so kind.{nl}Isn't he?
Damn， it just grazed， but it hurts so bad.{nl}Well done.
It will be completed if I have 松露 poison mushrooms at Ajidu intersection.{nl}I am counting on you.
Does 松露 have mushrooms?{nl}Look at the horn closely. That is in fact a mushroom.
Isn't it strange that the mushroom grows from the head?
Now， it is completed.{nl}Please mix all ingredients that you gathered from Altar of Harmony at Ajidu intersection.
That was the place to purify divine water or divine objects that will be dedicated to 薩勒 女神 before.{nl}Forget about the past. It is better to use that place for the best purpose now.
What's your impression of seeing the altar?{nl}I felt somwhat nostalgic by seeing it.
Anyways， the acidic liquid will be completed after mixing them!
With this acidic liquid， please melt the thorny vines.{nl}They are located on the upper side of Ajidu intersection.
I hope Vine Forest returns to it's look in the past.{nl}No birds come here anymore.
Vine Forest used be a beautiful forest once in the past.{nl}We， believers used to hold ritual ceremonies here.{nl}
After 博拉波， the demons' lord， came to this forest， it turned out like this.{nl}I can't remember when's the last time that I heard the sounds of birds. I miss the old， beautiful forest.
I miss the old forest sometimes.{nl}I also miss when I used to listen to the words of 薩勒s 女神.
Believer Birgis
There's nothing that we can't do with our religious faith.{nl}If there is anything that we can't do， then that's because our religious faith is not big enough.
Believer Noyus
계시자님， 부디 조심하세요.{nl}아까의 불길한 목소리와 비슷한 기운이 가시숲 전체를 울리고 있는 것 같아요.{nl}특히 낙우림쪽에서요.. 전 이런 쪽으로 귀가 밝거든요..
Supplies Officer
I am the supplies officer here.{nl}I received the list of supplies that is needed， but look at the number of supplies here.{nl}I can't manage them myself.{nl}
I will get scolded by Selina if I am late..{nl}Can you help me?{nl}I need the grass called Jilgyung.
The people in charge must have forgot about the support.{nl}If not， do they think that we can live by eating nothing?
Wow， so fast.{nl}But that's not an end.{nl}If it would be done with Jilgyung， than I could have finished it myself.
Meat is perfect to cheer us up. Meat.{nl}The cows that grew by eating apples will be good， but there aren't any cows here.{nl}Let's try to hunt for Tinis that have similar taste.
The number of supplies is not the only reason that I am not acting quickly.{nl}Bubbes stole supplies before.{nl}Nowadays， zigris are doing that..
This is enough. Well done.{nl}I feel happy to see meat.
So.. We have eveything we needed..I will check the list again and report to Selina.{nl}Wait..{nl}
Ah.. They are worse than those Bubbes. Damn!! The potion jars went all missing..{nl}Those zigris sometimes steal the objects that seem unique to them.{nl}
They are more than thieves.{nl}If anything looks good， they take it away.
We don't have to worry about Zigris for a while.{nl}They will be scared to think about you.{nl}
Now we have everthing we needed.{nl}I was able to prepare them by the deadline.{nl}Now， I am relieved.
Fortunately， everything look alright.{nl}Those Zigrises.. I want to show them how scary I am.
There is a flag at the Zigris camp which Bubbes installed long ago.{nl}Now zigris are at the place.{nl}I don't care about that， more important thing is..{nl}
They just stole all the supplies that I gathered hard! I can't forgive them.{nl}They must know the pain. Please burn down the flag.{nl}I will check the supplies again!
Hahaha! Damn you Zigris!{nl}Understand now how scary I am!
Damn， I am confused.{nl}I have so many things to do， but the number of monsters is not decreasing..{nl}Don't you think so? I should do the job， but those monsters..
預言or Owl Sculptor
So you finally came here.
Before we get into a real action， we should try destroying the monsters nearby.{nl}We can't just get into real action right now.
You are indeed growing.
You are indeed the person I was waiting for.
Okay. then let's get into the real actions.{nl}You should awake the owls that will give you tests.{nl}Awake the three sculptures and try those three tests.
I am sure you can do it.
Examiner Owl Sculpture
I will wait at the test site.{nl}Please awake the other owls.
Thanks.{nl}You woke me up.{nl}Are you read for the test?
I will wait at the test site.{nl}Good luck..
You woke me up..{nl}You are ready to take the test， right?
Okay， then let's start the test.{nl}Please come to the place.
You passed the first test.
Please prepare for the second test.{nl}Please talk to me when you are ready.
You passed the second test.
It's gonna be the last test.{nl}Are you ready?
You passed the last test.{nl}Congratulations.{nl}Please meet the 預言or Owl.
Please go to the forest again.{nl}The person waiting for you is there.{nl}Please put the pieces of the scupture toghther at the designated place.
Please do not forget your valuable experiences here.{nl}Don't be afraid， please move forward.
You woke me up to take the test.
I've been waiting for you. I'm the Swordsman 導師， the one who will help you. {nl} I'm not sure if you know about attribute training. {nl}
Attributes can give additional abilities to stats and skills. {nl} You can learn attributes from each class master by paying them silver.
You'll be able to fight easier if you learn attributes. {nl}
You've come to the right place. I'm the Wizard 導師. {nl} I'm going to teach you about attribute training. {nl}
Attributes can give additional abilities to stats and skills. {nl} You can learn attributes from each class master by paying them silver.
So did you understand the attributes? Now you'll be able to fight the enemies more easily.
How you become strong depends on what choice you make. {nl}It differs depending on your choice and thoughts.
Good to see you. I am the Archer 導師. {nl} Do you know about attribute training? {nl}
Attributes can give additional abilities to stats and skills. {nl} You can learn attributes from each class master by paying them silver.
Mastering this attribute will help your skills in combat.
希望是創造魔力的力量. {nl} 沒有什麼比法術更強的武器了.
弓箭手的箭是作為禮物帶給了敵人死亡。
有的人適合這把劍，有的人不適合。{nl} 這意味著你找到了比你生命更寶貴的東西。
游俠的箭指的可不止一個目標 {nl}
It's very likely you'll be exposed to the enemy when you shoot arrows. {nl} So my theory is that you have to use whatever comes in handy， like shields or stones.
有一件事我想告訴你…我認為你的攻擊不夠。 {nl} 如果你學習技能，你就可以在你需要的時候做出更強大的攻擊。
There are different skills for each class but you will be able to fight better when you learn it. {nl} Also， you can do a lot of things aside from attacking.
What do you think? There are a lot of useful skills， right? {nl} Using the skills effectively will be of great help in combat. {nl}
Oh， you said we need to assemble? {nl} Please let the 戰鬥指揮官 know about it too. He's over there on the right.
Guiding spirits is an important task， but it's not a pleasant task.{nl}There's nothing happier than living right?
Blackened boughs can be found when you defeat the monsters nearby.
Others are violent as well， but Filibos are the worst.{nl}They are resilient as hell.{nl}I think I can relax a bit if they get taken care of.
Jilgyung is all around here so you can easily find it.{nl}I will do other works first.
There are many Tinis when you climb up the hill from the road down.{nl}8 big scoops will do.
We don't have time collect the potion jars again.{nl}Let's go steal the jars that Zigris stole from us. They are the ones who started this.
Monsters really like the Essences of Spirits.{nl}They become strong when they absorb the power.
If it goes wrong.. then go meet the Gatekeeper Owl.{nl}He is most clever among us.{nl}May the 女神 bless you.
很高興見到你，女神的跟隨者。 {nl} 你知道怎麼學習特性嗎？
歡迎，你遵循女神的目標。{nl}你知道有關特性的訓練嗎？
現在你明白什麼是特性了嗎？ {nl} 獲取特性可以幫助你輕鬆擊敗敵人。 {nl}
治療和幫助別人是神職人員的使命。 {nl} 你怎麼能不理那些以女神之名尋求幫助的人。
人們因為聖樹之日而身心疲憊。{nl} 他們需要我們的幫助。
I am sorry， but please find my colleague Badat.{nl}I haven't heard anything from him since he left to do research.
I don't know where he is gone.{nl}He will be in danger without protection from mercenaries.
Gorath was looking for me?{nl}I am sorry. I will be done when I find the rest of the research materials.
Thanks. I was thinking maybe Tontus may have swallowed it.{nl}I promise you that I will go back to the researchers' camp when you find me this.
I remember the most of it， but those are really important research materials.{nl}They contain the information on how we could enter into the royal tomb and etc.
So this is all? hmm..{nl}Thanks for finding them. I will go back to the researchers' camp.
Monsters will get no benefits by obtaining those research materials.{nl}But， there are many people claiming that they lost the materials. Isn't it strange?
You want to be our disciple?{nl}Do you know who we are?
We should ask for more when we are in the era like nowadays.{nl}I don't know what they are looking for， but they pay a lot when something is discovered at the royal tomb.{nl}{nl}
Good. Good. This will be enough.
Go find the limes that the monsters ate now.
After finish making this， I am outta of this town.{nl}I stayed here so long.
Good. Go meet my partner at Garden of Poles with this.{nl}He is called Vincent and he is very skillful.
Ah. Welcome.{nl}There aren't any people in this world who can make counterfeits well like us.{nl}
I needed someone to do some errands.{nl}Get some firewoods that are scattered on the ground.
Vincent
Ah， ah so you are the newcomer.{nl}Check the thing behind me and if the thing inside of it gets solidified， bring it to me.{nl}{nl}
Where should we go?{nl}Are there more valuable places than the royal tomb?
You are very skillful as a starter.{nl}By the way.. do you know how we were able to survive in this world?
I am looking for the poles that were used in building the royal tomb.{nl}If you see unique poles， please let me know.
Aren't they amazing?{nl}I wish I live here forever doing researches on those poles.
They are great pieces.{nl}We should go to Zlugi ruins.
I request for your guard one more time.{nl}I don't want to get disturbed by the monsters while I am observing.
It was a good study because of you.{nl}But， I found some traces of magics on them. I feel angry about it.
Ho. As I expected.{nl}The one I am looking for must be marked.
I am smarter than you guys think!{nl}Do you think I am gonna get deceived by you guys?
It is a real honor to be selected as a member of the research team， but I am afraid that I would make a mistake.
The man with silver hair requested me something， what was it?{nl}Was it blond hair?
預言or Owl
Necroventer has obstructed the road to thorn forest. {nl} you must defeat the Necroventer to go to the forest of thorns.
The Owl Sculpture with anger
Die all those who are resistant to Necroventer.
자루머리 고개를 점령했던 네크로벤터가 사라졌습니다.{nl}자루머리 고개는 다시 평화로워지겠죠.
Revelator! I wanted to meet you for a long time.{nl}Pitt and I applied to the military because we wanted to listen to your heroic stories.{nl}But we are just standing guards..It's depressing.{nl}
If you are okay， can you persuade our commander so we can go out to the battlefield?{nl}The commander may permit us to go if you ask him..{nl}And that will be a good experience for us.
Wow， you are my role model. I respect you!
I think something good will happen since I met you.{nl}Yes.. something good will happen.
Hm Hm， actually.. {nl}I am here to solve the problems.. no， I was called to server for the military.{nl}
You probably saw it when you came a while ago. Thorny Bushes. They are very resilient， but we have a solution.{nl}I was born here so I know them well.{nl}
Please gather the fluids that come out from Tinis.{nl}It has a gland that contains the fluids near it's tail.{nl}Be careful since it smells bad.
I can make it quickly if I have them a lot.{nl}Yes. Very quickly..
Wow， it's more than I thought. {nl}Please wait a bit. It will be done quickly..
Okay.. When you pour this onto Thorny Bushes， they will die quickly.{nl}Yes. I grew that..ah， no. I made that. I can guarantee it's effectiveness.
What a lovely Thorny Bus..{nl}Ah! No. What am I saying..
What was that? I thought we just needed to get rid of Thorny Bushes.{nl}It was tremendous!{nl}
Herb broker is not here， anyways let's go back to the training camp!{nl}I want to tell this to Raimondas as soon as possible!

So you guys are the ones who wanted go to the battlefield?{nl}You guys are not good. Nothing to expect from you guys.{nl}And those pets.. are you guys crazy to take those pets to dangerous battle field?
What is that defiant glare? {nl}You don't wanna accept that you are not skillful?
Okay. I like your attitude.{nl}But that is not enough.{nl}Defeat those 傀儡 at the training camp and bring me the evidence that you defeated them. Then I will acknowledge your skill.
Fighting 傀儡 will be easier than going to the battlefield.
Lads. You came. Show me the evidence.{nl}You defeated 傀儡? or you just ran way from them?
Good! Very nice. I will acknowledge your skill.{nl}Do not ever forget. The ones who survive in this war are the winners.{nl}
Okay. You go back to Raimondas.{nl}Be confident.
Okay. Have you brought the evidence?
Very good. You guys are the members of my camp now.
The feeling that you felt while you were fighting against the 傀儡. Do not forget.{nl}The newcomers these day.. I don't find any confidence in them..
By the way.. I don't see that hairy creature that you used to take with you.{nl}Tell me what happened to it.
Okay. I received a strange report so I was wondering what happened.{nl}I heard the dead body of a monster was found near Morkos farm.
That monster looked like the monster you used to have.{nl}I will give you the first mission. Search Morcus farm.{nl}Find out if it's the same breed or if it's the monster that you used to have.
Good luck on your first mission.{nl}If that is him， it's so pity.
Ah.. how. could.. this.. It's not true. This body must not be 史拜昂's!!{nl}I can't believe it. Look closely， it must be a different monster.
No.. no way..how could you be.. no..
Ah.. 史拜昂!! how.. because of me.. you..{nl}We are so sorry..
Herb broker!! This is all because of the herb broker.{nl}I will find that broker and get revenge for 史拜昂!{nl}Where is he by the way?
It's not your fault that 史拜昂 turned out like this.{nl}Even if that's your fault， it's not that 史拜昂 should die.
Okay. What happened to the monster's dead body?{n}
..Okay.{nl}This would have never happened if I found out the identity of the broker sooner..{nl}Pitt， Bran， I am so imcompetent..I am so sorry.{nl}
I want to thank you. {nl}You made them real soldiers.{nl}
You probably saw it when you came a while ago. Thorny Bushes. They are very resilient， but we have a solution.{nl}I was born here so I know them well.{nl}
No one will help you even when you get defeated by 傀儡.{nl}You should save yourself.
Well done.{nl}I will take care of that myself.{nl}Those Siaulambs should practice to run away from now on.
I can't stand this anymore.{nl}I will defeat it myself.{nl}You follow me too. If you could help us， that will really help us out.
Thanks for saying that.{nl}I will wait at Malkos Felled Area.
If I was little more richer， than I would have hired a personal mercenary.{nl}It was my mistake to rely on the 女神' blessing too much.
I know many people are missing， but no one tries to find them.{nl}They don't even know those people even existed.
We should make some money when the world is in chaos.{nl}Ah， never mind.
Farewell to this land when this is over.{nl}I never saw that scary man before.
No one will believe what I saw.{nl}I learned something interesting from it.
I will lure Saugas.{nl}Bring me the poison from Woodfung near Alkune Stairway.{nl}And please also bring me the stone with vigor.{nl}
It's fortunate that you two are okay.{nl}Thanks for recognizing me. May the 女神 bless you.
Good luck.
I will feel more comfortable if I do that myself， but my knee which was shot by an arrow before aches a lot.
If you closely look at the stones across Apynys Camp， it will definitely appear.{nl}I hope the artifacts haven't digested fully yet.
Due to evil beings' trick， the protectors broke the stone plate which contained the rules of the royal tomb.{nl}Defeat the protectors and bring back the plate.
Those protectors are trying to break the stone lantern at the royal tomb.{nl}Block them. They are out of control.
Everything at the royal tomb is designed for the revelation.
The king's determination that was left only slightly made the protectors to remember protecting the stone plate only.{nl}That was so sad.
The rules of the royal tomb are in place.{nl}We can make the evil beings not to be near the revelation.
My wound is so deep so please pass the object to me when you find it.{nl}Meet Kepect at Apvija Hills.
I welcome you with our family's courtesy.{nl}To obtain the great king's spell， you need to be qualified and you should also possess courage and wisdom to unleash the seal.
There's a white oak tree at Zeme Plateau.{nl}First extract some fluids from it.
돌다리망터의 봉인을 풀 준비입니다.{nl}몇백 년 동안 아주 조금씩 모아 온 귀중한 수액이니 조심히 다뤄주세요.
This will be enough.{nl}Let's move on to the next step.
With these fluids， I will make the stone to unleash the seal.{nl}In the meantime， please save 槲寄生 at Pamirsit plateau.
You gotta get the one without poison.{nl}You may faint out for a while if you get addicted to it so be careful.
Our family has been waiting for the chosen one for hundreds of years.{nl}It is an real honor for us to meet you in our generation.
이걸로 완성입니다.{nl}봉인해제 결정석을 가지고 부러진 기둥 협곡으로 가세요.{nl}구스타스의 제자들이 아주 반갑게 맞아주실 겁니다.
It is sealed with two seals so that only the chosen one could obtain it.{nl}The chosen one should possess courage and wisdom to unleash all the seals.{nl}
Of course， our family men will guide you.{nl}We know that you are qualified.
These are fluids that I collected for hundreds of years.{nl}Be careful since lots of monstes are after those fluids.
대왕의 유산이 드디어 주인을 찾는 날이 오는군요.{nl}어서， 부러진 기둥 협곡의 구스타스의 제자들에게 가 보세요.
It's very fortunate that Jonas gained his consciousness back.
I was waiting for you.{nl}Do you have the key of the great king?{nl}
Okay. Find the map which indicates the location of the seal.{nl}There are also false information on the map so you should check many places.
This is something that should not be handed over to those demons.{nl}I don't know the exact location.
Nothing here.{nl}
But， there are still places to check.{nl}I will mark them on the map so check all those places.
You found.{nl}The inheritance of 澤凱瑞爾， the great king， has been waiting for you.{nl}
This map contains all the locations of the seal devices at Awaiting Stone Bridge.{nl}When you unleash the seals with the king's key， you will realize what to do next.
선생님이 독 때문에 숨을 쉬지 않아요.{nl}어서， 석주대의 다른 분들께 해독제를 빌려 오세요.
No 解毒劑s yet?{nl}His pulse is fading.{nl}
Thank you!{nl}Fortunately， he is breathing again.{nl}

Good!{nl}Now we just have to combine the flame into the jewel.
Let's go to the fusion machine.{nl}We just have to put all materials in it and the jewel will be completed when we activate the device.
We should succeed..
So this is the Jewel of 紅焰.. I can feel it's great energy.{nl}Let's quickly give this to Gabiya. There's stairs to go up on the right side.
To find the Jewel of 紅焰， just use this detector.{nl}When you use this detector near the place where the jewel is located， the jewel will come out.
The portal that you tried to open is the gate of lies.{nl}The villagers hear are the tricks of Demons' lord， 博拉波.
真令人尷尬，我也被欺騙和囚禁，失去了我所有的力量。{nl} 請摧毀囚禁我的魔法陣。
魔法陣確切的位置應該在 蝴蝶庭院 和 黃蜂空地。{nl}請趕快。
感謝你救了我。{nl}
我是薩勒，太陽女神 {nl} 一切就像萊瑪預見的那樣。
謝謝你。但束縛我的，不止這一個。{nl} 我們必須找到隱藏在次元裂縫中的 克萊蒙
請把我的祭祀工具帶到 大迴廊. {nl} 我會試著把神聖的力量注入工具內。
Thank you. {nl} This much divine power would be enough.
이제부터 클라이멘을 찾도록 집중하겠습니다.{nl}주변의 마족을 처치하여 조금이라도 마기를 억눌러 주세요.
Just a bit more. Please suppress the Magi.
이쉬필키 진입로에서 클라이멘이 느껴집니다.{nl}어서 그를 처치해 주세요.{nl}
It's his key. {nl} Please let me free.
Thank you in the name of 薩勒， the Goddess of the sun. {nl}
It's a shame but the revelation is in the hands of 博拉波. {nl} The reason he imprisoned me instead of killing me is to use my divinity to interpret the revelation. {nl}
But the 博拉波 is also not in its normal condition due to the previous battle. {nl} Please stop the 博拉波 in the gateway with my followers and get the revelation back.
Show me the revelation. {nl} I'll show you its meaning.
如果神聖之力注入了祭祀道具， 那麼我們就可以用它來找到 克萊蒙. {nl}
萊莉安娜
쪽빛나무 고원에 사는 가족들이 보고 싶네요. {nl}그리고.. 오빠와 크게 다퉜던 일을 사과하고 싶어요.
我真的很想知道我的家人在做什麼，但是我太害怕怪物會回去。{nl} 我剛從房子裡跑出來，我很後悔。
쪽빛나무 고원에서 오빠랑 개울 물에 발을 담그며 노래를 불렀던 생각이 나요
I just feel sorry to my brother.
Old man of Andail village
God is looking after our village so our village has clear water and air. And there are no disasters here.

Aren't you the Revelator? {nl} So， what brings you to our village? {nl}
女神 薩勒? {nl} We haven't seen her for a long time. {nl}
The portal leading to 女神 薩勒 just won't open. {nl}I think it's all because the diving pond is contaminated.
Tanu in Zvelgian vacant lot has the purifying stone. {nl} That would be able to purify the pond.
Just like there are many demons， same goes for the Goddesses. {nl} The five Goddesses are just the ones who became well known.
Our village serves 女神 薩勒 who overlooks the sun. {nl}We used to go see her a lot before through the portal but one day， the portal closed.
I haved carved the owls for a long time.{nl}At one point in time， they got their lives and determination.{nl}
When I gained my conciousness， a few hundreds of years have passed.
雕塑家應該小心不要誇大自己的能力。{nl}他們應該謙卑。
It is a good sign that you， the revelator came here.{nl}We've been waiting for you for a long time.
Please come to our village.{nl}Villagers will really like you.{nl}For sure.
The god guides us to meet together.
Don't think it's a pain. We received a blessing.
Trust the god.{nl}We can be together in the tree.
We will be saved by being together.{nl}The god had told us to do that.
Not yet?{nl}Where is the girl?
I can't use my power since I was deceivied by the demon's trick.{nl}You should find my power to guide you to the revelation.
That portal is the gate to lies.{nl}Laima has brought you to me because of that.
博拉波， the lord of the demons can never be forgiven.
博拉波 must be recovering his power even at this moment.{nl}Please meet the believers at 關門路.
Please be careful of the trick of the observer at 關門路.
I am gonna stay here and recover my lost energy.{nl}I don't wanna create chaos in this world so please do not tell my existence to anyone.
The royal tomb you should go can be reached only through the portal that I have opened for you.{nl}May the 女神 bless you.
It seems that rain won't stop. In fact， it rarely stopped.{nl}Do you think this is because of the vicious energy?
These thorny bushes just keep growing even after we cut them.{nl}But it's better than doing nothing.
Even if 博拉波 gets dissappeared， I think I am gonna stay like this for a while.{nl}Whole forest is covered with thorny bushes. They are so big.
So， you seem to live up to your reputation. {nl} Our people in the village are just cowards hoping the Goddess will take care of everything.
But， did you not see the young man of our village? {nl} I told him to ge see how the portal works but I have not heard back since then.
Thank you. {nl} The portal is in the Nugria Sanctuary.
Injured Villager
Thank you for saving me.
So you're the Revelator the Mayor spoke about. {nl} I'm fine so please check the portal of the Sanctuary.
The portal can be opened from the altar in Nugria Sanctuary
It does not work. {nl} That's a big problem. {nl}
저 대신 마름포석골에 계신 원로님께 알려주시겠어요?{nl}여기서 왼쪽으로 올라가시면 금방이에요.
That portal is.. a fantasy... No. A portal going to 女神 薩勒. {nl} Anyway， opening the portal is very important.
Injuries are not that severe so don't worry. Please check the portal in the sanctuary first.
I will move again if I take a little rest.{nl}First， the portal..
Ah， so you are the revelator!{nl}It's a real honor for us.
Monsters are trying to attack us， but we can't just quit the purification process.{nl}薩勒 has told us to do that.
가장 중요한 뿌리가 낙우림 어딘가에 있을 텐데 너무 들쑤시고 다녔나봐요.{nl}그것만 잘라 버리면 이 숲의 기세도 줄어들텐데.

We will destroy anyone who intrudes into the royal tomb.
It is our mission to protect 澤凱瑞爾 who is in his rest.{nl}We will defeat anyone who disturbs 澤凱瑞爾's rest.
Wheelen! Oh， my faithful protectors..{nl}If the chosen one comes here， do your best to give him the weapon of Saam.{nl}The spear that will break the armor of evil.
Venucelos is very brave and loyal.{nl}But， if his loyalty faces towards my enemies， he will be worthless.{nl}The dogs who can't protect the royal tomb will lose the leash with the king's name on it.

The proof of powerfulness! Such a beautiful words..{nl}澤凱瑞爾 was proud to create the gigantic protectors.{nl}And he put the secret documents of the kingdom in those protectors so that the one who defeats them can get those documents.
The statue of the protector
Listen quietly with your eyes closed.{nl}The nature keeps singing to us the songs of lives.
邪靈祭司是處在人類生和死之間{nl} 如果你想知道，這就是 邪靈祭司。
You don't look like a delivery man. What's up?{nl}
I can't see the head of the tree with long branches. Do you want me to get it for you?
克萊佩達是一個寧靜的小城鎮。{nl} 之前我們還沒有這麼多人來鎮上。
女神提到過他在夢中的啟示嗎？
前往 克萊佩達。{nl} 指揮官 烏斯加 在中心廣場等著你。{nl}
我聽到主教也做了一個關於女神的夢... 我認為他們之間有什麼聯繫。
That girl. {nl} She just appeared in town some time ago. {nl}
I mean she didn't speak and her clothes were all dirty. {nl} She seemed hungry so I brought her home to feed her some food and this happened.
I mean the girl who was confined together with us last time. {nl} Do you think she has a family? It seemed like she can not speak at all. {nl}
If I was a parent， I probably would have gone around mad looking for my daughter. {nl} Parents nowadays are really irresponsible. {nl}
The girl did not speak at all. {nl} In addition to that， a young lady all grown up walking all the way to this remote village barefoot. Doesn't it seem strange?
Can we go home..
I want to go home soon..
이 봉인을 풀었다는 소녀도 궁금하군요.{nl}절대로 쉽게 풀 수 있는 봉인이 아닙니다.{nl}{nl}
Husband of refugee family
몬스터를 피해 제 아내와 이곳으로 도망쳐 왔습니다.{nl}제미나 여신께서 지켜주고 계시지만 언제까지 버틸 수 있을지 모르겠네요.
喔， 配件商人 說有一份禮物給你 {nl} 你想不想見他？
你可以在左手邊找到 配件商人。
配件商人

如果盔甲保護你免受物理攻擊， 那麼配件則是保護你免受魔法攻擊. {nl} 我希望它會對你是有用。
你可以在左手邊找到 配件商人。 {nl}
Ah， I was waiting for you.{nl}You are the person chosen by the eyes of 澤凱瑞爾 right?
Welcome.
Oh， seems like you have Yukopus leaves and 凱帕 stems. {nl} I need a lot of those. Can you share some with me?

I know you tried hard but I need some more.
I still need more Yukopus leaves and 凱帕 stems. {nl} But I don't want to just take them from you. What about trading it with the potions I have?
Your act of kindness really gives me a lot of strength.
Thanks you! {nl}I hope it would be helpful for you.
Yukopus and 凱帕s appear around the Miner's Village.
Hey， are you going to take on those 瓦布? {nl} But your equipment seems a bit shabby... Do you mind if I help you with it?
Get me a few materials and I'll help you craft some new armors. {nl} The materials needed can be obtained from Large 紅色凱帕， Yukofus， and 瓦布 Thief.
Large 紅色凱帕， 紅色凱帕， Yukopus， and 瓦布 Thief. {nl} Not sure if it's a good thing but you can craft some pretty useful stuff with what the monsters drop.
I'll give you the 圖紙 so try crafting the armor with the materials I gave you. {nl} You will feel more reassured. Well then， may the Bless of Goddess be with you!
I am looking for medicines to cure wounded ones.
Oh you brought it. {nl} This is the front plate. {nl} Keep it until we have all the parts ready to craft an armor.
Oh， here we are. Let's see. {nl} Seems like you brought enough of what we needed. {nl} You can make a Mantle with it. {nl} This reminds me of the good old days.
Ordinary Man
This is the back plate. {nl} I'll let you craft when we have all the other materials ready.
Here you go. This is a Chest protector made of leather. {nl}It was fun to do this in a long time.
骨頭 fragments are seen in the well.

Dear Revelator， I have a favor to ask of you. {nl}Can you return the keepsakes of my comrades?
It's bad enough that they were killed by the 瓦布， but even their keepsakes are being abused. How awful...
Thank you. {nl} My comrades will now be able to rest in peace.
Oh my God. The 瓦布 stole all the food supplies. {nl} They took even our immediate food... Please use your strength to help us.
They stole the food meant for both the army and the 居民s. {nl} What do we do if we can't get back our food.. {nl}
Thank you. {nl} This will at least get us through the next few days.
Thank you for your help earlier， but there are more keepsakes that need to be retrieved. {nl} Think of my comrades who can't rest in peace.. {nl}
So please help us. {nl} If you get us back the rest of the keepsakes， we will provide compensation.
Thank you， but we still need more... {nl} Sorry... {nl}
We've almost collected all the keepsakes... {nl} Please help us til the end.
It hurts to think about giving these keepsakes to my dead comrades' families.
Thank you very much. {nl} My comrades can now rest in peace with the Goddesses.
We survived immediate danger with your help earlier， but we still need some assistance. {nl} Could you help us out a bit more?
I'm enraged thinking about the 瓦布 who will be heartily satisfied with our food. {nl}Especially with such difficult times nowadays.
Thank you. {nl} We're still lacking some goods， but at least we got back this much.
佩帝米安 居民

희미한 묘지의 몬스터라면 네겐 적당히 공정한 내기가 아닌가 싶은데.{nl}아닌가?
Haha， I lost.{nl}You are great as I heard so. Here， it's your reward as promised/

It's freightening to think that I turned out like this after all.{nl}I don't know whether I will bury one more revelator in the future.. You won't know either.
Are you proud of your skills to talk to me at this moment while the time is passing?
If a person becomes a handful of soils after his death， can you imagine how he will be treated.{nl}The soils that once conquered this world..
Yes. You managed to avoid being like me. Yes..
Without the blessing from the 女神， You must be near the 女神 now.{nl}But lots of people can't do that anymore.{nl}

Innocent Spirit

My brother asked you to give this necklace to me? {nl} Where is my brother?

Now I can go back to my hometown.{nl}Do you best， newcomer..
Errand Man

Letter forme? What is this.. {nl}
Curse? I get it， I get it!{nl} I'll give you this money， so please tell him to not curse!
huhu. Poor guy. He won't be able to see the light soon {nl} Whether it's in prison or coffin， only he will know. {nl} I feel sorry for the dead soldiers.
Oh， I really thank you for last time. {nl}My injury is getting better now that I can move. {nl}
But， uh， I'm too hungry and do not have energy to go back to boss. If {nl} If you have anything to eat， can you share some?

Chicks.. They remind me of Sparnas.{nl}I don't wanna see him even in my dreams.

Not yet?{nl}They will fit on you nicely.
Yes. Well done.{nl}Here you go. It's a gift to you as promised.{nl}
Don't underestimate it. It was a strong animal in the old stories.{nl}In some places， one becomes an enemy to all other people just by touching that animal.
죄송하지만， 이 제문을 무무고원에 있는 비문 앞에서 태워 주실 수 있을까요?{nl}협곡지대를 샅샅이 탐험하신 계시자님이라면 그들의 넋을 달랠 자격이 충분한 것 같아서요.
The canyon area is like a grave for many explorers and historians. {nl} And we study to find more factual history on top of their graves.
Thank you. {nl} Our academia will not forget him too.
The revelator is lying here after he said such thing.{nl}If he survives after facing the nearby monsters for 2 分鐘，

Oh.. It's absurdity gets me at loss for words every time I look at it. {nl} Was is really this fragile..
I don't feel good.{nl}We may have to evacuate from here.

I will pray for that monsterl.{nl}If there are spirits who would listen to my prayer..
Unfortunately... I don't know where my brother is. {nl} He also probably won't know my whereabouts too.
I can't leave here unless I complete the mission..
He is so stupid. {nl} He could have given it sooner in good terms rather than getting on each other's nerves. {nl} Hmm. Maybe I belittled myself too much.
Don't you act like you know me anymore! {nl} It not my fault. That's the one who's bad!

坦白說，我害怕世界會變成什麼樣。

真誠是我的力量。{nl} 如果你真誠地相信並跟隨女神，那就不會有問題。

We should check by rubbing Hallowventer's wooden coals.{nl}The next epitaph is at the right side of Negibas Fields.
We can suppress the vicious energy if the magic of the tomb get unleashed.{nl}I need the activating stone that is located inside the protector.
It seems that there are more monsters here now compared to the number monsters that were present before I lost my conciousness.{nl}Did something happen to Gabiya?
It mya be better for Gabiy to let her know that we are here.{nl}There's a people that we can ignite light on. Let's go.
Good. Since she knows that we came， she will recover her health.{nl}Let's go up to see Gabiya.{nl{nl}
I could handle it myself. {nl}Those weaklings would come trembling on their knees to return the parts. {nl} But what if more thieves come while I'm at it?
Welcome， I'm glad to see that you've had a safe journey here. {nl}Before anything else， there are things about this place that the Revelator should know. {nl}
That's why I am thinking about setting fire.{nl}I hope you collect the fats by defeating Malidus.
I leave Ruklys on this land with my regrets and tears.{nl}If there's someone who wants to continue his will， I want to leave my secret on this gravestone.{nl}I will summarize the long writings here.
Even if a person is in danger， if he knows that someone will come to help him， he will have the extra energy to endure longer.
If you are a true revelator， you can find the divine secret at the end of this paper.
The space movement magic field will take you to your preferred floor in the tower.{nl}I don't know if we can use the field anymore. Let's go and find out.
Damn.{nl}They broke it. It is unfixable.
When you activate the device which sets barriers， monsters wont't be able to come in.{nl}The supply device for Demon's power is broken， but we can input the power with other methods.
We have to be careful from here.{nl}This is the place where Antares， a dangerous magician， was prisoned.{nl}We should move up to the next floor quickly.
He was a great magician before.{nl}But， his ideology was too dangerous.

The reason why he was prisoned here was because he badly wanted the concentrated demons' power here.{nl}What do you think would happen to the tower when the power which was concentrated for hundreds of years explode at once?
Gabiya is important， but the tower is more dangerous.{nl}Antares may be engaged in something by now.
There are two valves here that control the power device.{nl}The first valve is at the lab room so let's go and destroy it now.
Explosion， that was too dangerous.{nl}Let's find a safer way to destroy it.
Antares was researching for a long time on the flow of the demon's power.{nl}If his research materials are still present， they will help us in destroying those valves.{nl}They must be here somewhere.
This is it. Now I think I know how to break those valves.
Please set this stone and defeat the monsters around.{nl}We can collect the energy to recharge the barrier device.
A suitable end for a crazy magician.{nl}It could have been dangerous without defensive magics.{nl}We may have touched it without knowing the first valve was destroyed..{nl}
Anyways， that's good.{nl}The tower is now safe， so let's go up.
Ah， that's right. Let's also prepare defensive magics in case something happens.{nl}There was a magic written on Antare's materials that we can use when there are explosions.
I think I can find a way if I have the 核心 of Red Infro Rocktor. {nl}I can't use magic but that does't mean I lost my knowledge.
Good. We can use it one more time.{nl}
Let's go find the second valve on the central control room.{nl}If we can destroy it， we will be safe no matter what Antares does.
The Jewel of 紅焰 is somewhat strange.{nl}Something must have went wrong when Antares was exploded a while ago.
Let's check the status while we defeat the monsters with the Jewel of 紅焰.
What is happening to the Jewel of 紅焰?{nl}It is very instable.
Did you just see that monster exploding?{nl}It's definitely strange. it seems as if the power of essence is going crazy.
And me.. I feel dizzy..
If we stay like this， the Jewel of 紅焰 may break{nl}There must be a stabilizing device somewhere here. Let's go.
Ah， the stabilization has come to an end.{nl}I am okay. It's nothing. Just old memory coming back.
The Jewel of 紅焰 has stopped going crazy.{nl}But， in order to stabilize it fully， we need the Essence of Flame from the fireplace at the middle of the tower.
You gathered everything.{nl}Give them to me. Including the Jewel.{nl}I know the way to stabilize it fully so let's go to lab room.
Good! We can activate the device now.
You..are the revelator who helped the 聖騎士 導師 right?{nl}My name is Grita. I came from the Magicians' Tower.
Help me. Gabiya is in danger.{nl}We are gonna lose the tower to the demons if we don't receive help.
There is a way to stop it but only you can do it. {nl}Please， come to Karsta battlefield in 佩帝米安 outskirt.
This is then entrance to the tower.{nl}I became unconscious at the tower and lost all the power somehow.{nl}
I will take care of you and take you to Gabiya.{nl}Are you ready?
All other magicians either died or ran away.{nl}You are the last hope of us. Let's go it.
Gabiya had not disappeared herself.{nl}To protect the tower from demons， she just could not appear.{nl}
Agailla Flurry's is not found is successor， I heard and was borne away instead. To refer it's in order to ensure that a {nl} something important .. I don't know exactly.
I was sealed when my spirit is ripped off by high class demon.{nl}Please get rid of Infrorotor for me. I promise you that I will not be burden to you.
Eyes of Surveillance are attached to Infroroktor.
Those pieces of another me lost the voices to call you.{nl}Please find my voice again from Arma.
Let's meet at Technical Room 1. {nl}Ah， it will be better if you could get the Blackened Essence from monsters.
We need the rope for ceremony to make the shaman doll. {nl} It's on the waist of the Panto Shaman in the Cottage. {nl} Bring it to me.
Please go to Viesa's Altar.{nl}I will follow you.
It's either Rexipher destroying the altar， or us activating the altar. {nl}Run and don't look back!
Looks like the necklace and collection belongs to you. {nl}If it wasn't for you， teachings of Mayvern would have been left as a curse.
Let's give up on this and move to the big transportation magic field instead.
The Asmodian attacked the tower is not the first time， but did Mase Long earthquake up here. Thanks to {nl}， and whether they are by but Gabija disappeared in the world?
That was a trap.{nl}It seems that they read every movements of us.{nl}
There's nothing we can do about it.{nl}Even it would be little late， let's give up on the magic field and destroy those monsters who are coming into the tower first.
The protective barrier device is on the left end of his hallway.{nl}Let's go upstairs right after we activate the device.
The protective barrier device is at the left end of this hallway.{nl}It seems okay yet.
Good!{nl}There wouldn't be more monsters now.{nl}
Soon Let's go to the next floor.{nl}Gabija is awaiting us.{nl}
It will be completed if I have 松露 poison mushrooms at Ajidu intersection.{nl}I am counting on you.
We are the believers of 薩勒 Goddess.{nl}We are here to prevent Thorny Bushes from growing in this forest.{nl}
We have no choice. We should get charcoal ourself.{nl}Those trees with long branches at the square at the brook will do us good.
This is all my fault. I shouldn't have underestimated it.
I told you that there's an way to block those demons at 佩帝米安.{nl}I will complete the jewel of 紅焰 here and help the 女神 Gabiya.{nl}
Well done.{nl}But， this is just an empty stone.{nl}You can complete it by empowering it with various ingredients.
I will fill the Jewel of 紅焰 with flame steam.{nl}There is a flame steam with magic possesed in it at the reading room.
You should search for it hard.{nl}The flame steam is not clearly visible.
This is enough. Well done.
Now we have to fill the Essence of Fire into the jewel， but it's complicated.{nl}
First， unleash the steam from Jewel of 紅焰.{nl}Then the steam will collect the Essence of Flame that are hovering in the air.{nl}You just have to fill that it the jar. Okay?
Don't worry. It won't hurt you or expode.
Hew .. {nl}We almost completed the Jewel of Prominece!
I will collect the sources of the flame into the last pot.{nl}You can get them from the monster that has the power of fire.
Gabiya will recover her energy if we could make the Jewel of 紅焰 completely.
Good!{nl}Now we just have to combine the flame into the jewel.
Let's go to the fusion machine.{nl}We just have to put all materials in it and the jewel will be completed when we activate the device.
So this is the Jewel of 紅焰. I can feel it's great energy.{nl}Let's quickly give this to Gabiya. There's stairs to go up on the right side.
To find the Jewel of 紅焰， just use this detector.{nl}When you use this detector near the place where the jewel is located， the jewel will come out.

歡迎. {nl} 這些東西難才搞到呢.

The demons' attacks are quite aggressive.{nl}If we could somehow defeat Glizardon， I think they would be discouraged.
I want to request to you to defeat Pawndel and Pawnd.{nl}They are demon sisters and they give us headaches.
Activate Malda Altar and the demons nearby it will be sealed. {nl}When you defeat those demons， the altar would absorb the power.
Let's check the status while we defeat the monsters with the Jewel of 紅焰.
I can't tell my name. {nl}Please get rid of the observers and unleash the seal on me.{nl}
My sould is shredded and trapped in the seal. {nl}Get rid of the Experimental Slime that's guarding it and help me get released.
The Holy Arc that had me inside is broken and the observers obtained those pieces.{nl}Please defeat them and complete the Holy Arc.
Our guards love to fight {nl}Pantos were not this reckless before. {nl}I wonder if we should be like this when the Demons waiting to march in.
If possible， I want you to defeat Carnivore as well.{nl}It is polluted with the demonic energy and I can't stand it anymore.
Tools for stonemaisons? {nl}10，000 Sivers will do.{nl}{nl}
Welcome.
It was made long ago， but any stones will break it.
I will find the key to open the last seal.{nl}After opening a space with this scroll. You better be careful since you don't know what's gonna come out.
Hmm. You're really good as they say. {nl}Rolandas is waiting for you in 阿克梅斯山嶺.
We will be ready when we rub Monster's poison on the stone with full of vigor.{nl}It will be done when we put this bait on the Alkune Hill.
Can I ask you one more favor?{nl}I want you to defeat the monster at Odega Hills.{nl}It disturbs my research.
A monster in disguise as Goddess Statue. I pity the souls. {nl}Now the souls may rest in peace. This is all thanks to you.
We didn't just stay put when we were sieged by the mosnters. {nl}We sent out scouts to get away from here but no one came back. {nl}
If you are okay， I want you to search for them.{nl}
It's gonna be hard.{nl}The thorny forest is keep enlarging.
A dark aura similar to the voice a while ago is covering the Thorny Forest. {nl}Especially the Kavilas Forest... Please be careful...
Good. {nl}First， defeat the Big Blue Grivas up the hills.
When you throw this bomb to the long branch trees， they will burn.{nl}When you feel they are burnt enough， destroy those tress to get wood coals.{nl}
Be careful. This place is full of the evil energy from 博拉波.{nl}You better go back to be safe.
Ah， it was you revelator! Could you help me little more?{nl}I am trying to burn down the thorny bushes that are full of evil energy.
There's a demon that I want you to defeat.{nl}The monster is called Likaous at Thorny Pole Garden. It brings vicious atmosphere with him.
A very ominous voice is looking for you.{nl}Please be careful...

I never thought I would meet someone other than a believer here which is full of thorny bushes and the monsters.{nl}It would be hard without the protection of the 女神. Don't you think so， Revelator?{nl}
So you are the revelator. The believers are having a hard time due to the thorny bushes.{nl}How about you help them...
The evil force was first felt in 欺詐森林. {nl}The force was very strong so it will remain this way for a while even if you get rid of 博拉波.
The evil force of 欺詐森林 is becomeing stronger but our followers are becoming weak. {nl}I am worried that we may lose to the evil. I hope the revelator was with us...
Really?{nl}I will let the believers know that you are helping them.
Help me. Infroholders are chasing after me.{nl}I will lose when they move in a herd like that.
Put Matsum's flower alcohol in this potion and shake it. {nl} It will help you withstand the muddy aura of 博拉波.
This place is too dangerous. {nl}Please go to a safe area.
I can feel 克萊蒙 in Ishpirki Entrance. {nl}Hurry and get rid of it.
博拉波...{nl}It is so pity that it denys its fate.{nl}
When I gained my conciousness， a few hundreds of years have passed.
Jane's spirit
I saved nothing.{nl}導師， Magicians' Tower， and my peace...{nl}
You have no reason to help me， but it's been such a long time that I saw a man alive.{nl}Can you listen to my story if you are okay?
Thanks. It's going to be a long story.
It's too selfish to seek for the salvation now.{nl}Exhausted. It may be better to eliminate Akorn with me.
Salvation... Would I be able to have hope.{nl}Then， I will count on you.{nl}

You gotta find a way to block the magical power that will be injected with the magical stone of the interaction.{nl}If we could find the documents that Balryus left at Beiniki Prayer's Room， it may not be a meaningless dream...
Salvation... That's the word that I forgot for a long time. I thought hope was extravagant.{nl}All I could do was just depress for a long time.
Okay. Was the document present?
Magic generating stones.{nl}They are at the room of senses and the room of rituals.{nl}
I know the basic composition. I've researched it when I was alive.{nl}But， it won't react if it's not Balryus magical power.
You can find the artifacts of Balryus from Bebaiki chamber.{nl}The magical power would still be there since Balryus was a great magician.
I am sure the magical power still remains.{nl}There's no other way so I hope it still exists.
It's fortunate that the magical power still remains.{nl}First， let's stop the magic generating stone near the room of senses.
I hid the magic generating stones among the fakes in the room of senses.{nl}But， with the brooch you found， you will be able to distinguish the real ones from the fakes.
Keep this in mind. Pick out the real magic generating stones and stop the magical power.{nl}If you touch on the fakes， all magic generating stones will be activated again.
I felt earnestness for the first time in hundreds of years.{nl}To prevent it from ending meaninglessly， I will pray to the 女神es.
The magical power that came from the room of senses has completely disappeared.{nl}Now， we just have to block the room of rituals.
The room of rituals is slightly different from the room of senses.{nl}Although， they are the same that you have to shut down the magical power of all magic generating stones.{nl}
You will know how to handle it when you control it yourself.{nl}But， if you feel something went wrong， use the magical power of Balryus.
With the warp magic field under me， you could quickly go to the room of rituals.{nl}I hope you are successful...
The magic generating stones in the room of rituals affect the other magic generating stones nearby.{nl}We could start over with Balyus' magic.
The magical power that was supplied to the magical stone of the interaction has been completely shut off... {nl}Do you think we can really wish for the salvation.
We are all ready. But， that Akorn is different from the Akorn from your era. {nl}It may be better to leave it like that.
We have an other way. The sealed artifact among Balryus artifacts...{nl}I heard there are some of them in Uzdaromo stone chamber that were created to suppress the demons.
I already gave up the hope that I would be free a few hundreds years ago.{nl}In fact， I still can't believe it.
The seal that is suppressing the demonic energy... that's it.{nl}Now everything is ready.
Now， when the magical stone of the interaction stops， I will be free with Akorn.{nl}
I will tell you one more time. You should not think of Akorn that was present in your era.{nl}It will be hard without using the seal.
In fact， I am okay even if I disappear like this.{nl}It's so thankful that you care for me， but I don't want you to get hurt.
We are almost at the moment of being released from the restraint that was on us for hundreds of years.{nl}
I can be saved. I... finally...{nl}I can't thank you enough.{nl}
I will now leave to the 女神es.{nl}Thank you. Thank you so much...
How's going?{nl}We can alleviate the strange energy in this region when we enhance the magic field.
If I only had little more time...{nl}My documents... I can't leave them...
The objects are useless to me now...{nl}Okay. Maybe you... My documents at Dykyne Crossroad...
I don't have regrets anymore... but， be careful about that man.
Let's see， while I am cleaning this...{nl}I am sorry， but while I am bringing the brush and the tools for the rubber copy， can you take care of the tombstone at Gritis Hall?
Will be wandering when the string of the destiny disconnects...{nl}It must mean Laima Goddess... But there's a rumor that she appeared... It's complicated.
When someone borns with a gold spoon， life will be good.
{nl}What， what the hell...
It's too soon to be disappointed.{nl}When I went to Vegio Cliffs， there was one more tombstone.{nl}
But， it seems that the ink won't be smeared due to the mosses.{nl}The juice of Crout Grass will solve it. I forgot to bring it when I came back.
Don't accept the forecasts of the oracles as the foresight of the future.{nl}Sometimes， they could help us determine what's right and wrong as we live on.{nl}
Was it difficult? But， you will soon know.{nl}You will soon find the clue that would solve the interwined world.

When you find all the grass juice of Crouts， rub them onto the tombstones at Vegio Cliff until the mosses rub out.{nl}It is famous for having the smell that lures the monsters... I do have a good assitant.
You will see the effects right away when you rub the grass juice on it， but you should leave it for a while.{nl}The mosses will go away.
It wasn't effective? I guess the moss is not normal.{nl}Hmm. Then I guess I should ask Bidotas. There must be some way.
Okay then I will go. {nl}Ah， can I ask you to get the 骨頭 powders of monsters?{nl}I need something sticky that would help the ink to be smeared well.
Luckily， Bidotas gave me a good one.{nl}I heard you should use this special ink with the sticky liquid.
Okay. I want you to do the last rubber copy with this.{nl}My legs ache since I travelled too far...
I have a good feeling about this.{nl}Don't you think we may be able to find decent forecast this time?
The world for the death of the death also would exist
{nl}Death after death? This... This may be the forecast that I was looking for.{nl}
I should research more on this forecast. {nl}Thank you so much!
While I am interpreting this， I will give you the rope with a magnet so please go to the well with that.{nl}I saw a gold plate on the floor. If that's the plate， it will come up after being attached.
There's no strange reason.{nl}The people used to live here even before the empire was built here.{nl}
A small village becomes a big village and then a city...{nl}And then it will be forgotten.
I told you a while ago， but if possible， I would have pulled it out.{nl}Please beware of the surroundings near you.
Difficult， difficult...{nl}The words are hard to understand.
I guess it was the gold plate.{nl}It was lucky that the well was dried... If not， it could have been horrible.{nl}
I will organize them and show you later.{nl}You are the revelator. They will help your journey to find the 女神es.
It seems that the gold plates that you've brought can't be worked due to the rusts.{nl}Why did they record on the gold plate...
In fact， I didn't know what this gold plate was.{nl}Since this place is the hometown of Demetrius， I came here expecting something may be present.{nl{
Nothing was engraved on it， rather it was full of rusts.
At then， my eyes were ignited with flame.{nl}Demetrius has something to tell you.
Yes. Now is not the time to just complain. First， I should make the rust remover.{nl}I want you to obtain the inner 核心 of Hallowbenter Magician.
Get rid of the rusts with the rust remover and maintain it with the anticorrosive agent. {nl}If it weren't you， I wouldn't have done it.
Fast indeed.{nl}Okay. I will make the acidic solution with this. It will become the basis of the rust remover.
Secondly， when we sprinkle the rust powders， some monsters react.{nl}Collect some boiling liquid from that monster. A lot of it.
Ah. If you sprinkle it too much， it may endure all the monsters nearby.{nl}
I went to meet 煉金術士 in Mine Village because of Rust Remover and Acidic Solution.{nl}He was being so arrogant...
Well done. {nl}This place is almost completed so go help Alruida near Apsuba Hall.
Ah， I forgot to tell you. {nl}He is my colleague. He is probably looking for the gold plate at the great hall.
Alruida
You came here since Yustas told you to help?{nl}I was tired as hell so I really welcome you.{nl}
First， we should look for the gold plate at the great hall.{nl}Shall we start?
Someone should research at the camp and the other person should look for the gold plate.{nl}That's why I am here. I am not a coward like Yustas.{nl}
Now， I know all the locations of the gold plates， but I can't do anything about the monsters.{nl}It is so fortunate that you would help me. really.
This reaction reagent only reacts to the gold plates from the specific era.{nl}The gold plate that shows boiling response is the one that we are looking for. You understand right?
We gotta distinguish the real ones by finding out when the gold plate was created.{nl}We should look for the gold plate that was built before the establishment of the kingdom.
The next one is at Apsuba Hall.{nl}The gold plate is under the bushes in the corner， but I can't do anything about it myself.
Originally， it was forgotten and was deep in the ground.{nl}But， the day of the divine tree was in fact beneficial.{nl}
As the land caved over， they were carried away to the various places in 歷史遺跡...{nl}That's our prediction.
Be careful all the time. The monsters here rush in scarelessly.
It is a disaster to someone and it is a blessing for the other.{nl}I can remember the words from the old literature.
Oh! That's it. Give it to me. Let's see... I should first make it corrode.
The gold plate that you found for me a while ago... I think the next part is remaining.{nl}The gold plate that I know is that one so I don't know what to do from now.{nl}
Ah， there is one place that I haven't searched yet. Polsas Highway.{nl}Could you go there for me?
Bring this detector.{nl}From the place where you can feel the reaction， the gold plate must be there.
That's it! Now we found all the records.{nl}You've done it well. Now， I should sprinkle this rust remover so give it to me.
As I expected， this gold plate was the last one.{nl}Now we've collected all gold plates... I think I know what's written on them.{nl}
Can you give this to Yustas?
So Alruida did it and the gold plate that we didn't know...{nl}Okay. We solved all the puzzles. Please wait a bit.
Yustas must be waiting.{nl}Please give it to him.
I never thought that the gold plate would explode. I am sorry.{nl}I will gather the contents all at once later and show you.
These are the contents that I never thought about.{nl}The 女神es and the humans once used to live together. And the demons?{nl}
If Demetrius is sane， this record... okay.{nl}I promised you that I will show you the record so read the copy yourself.{nl}Well done indeed!
They were gentle monsters but suddenly became vicious. {nl}Have you also heard anything like this?
Revelator， we are in trouble. Please help us!{nl}As you can see， the workers are dying due to the poison of the monsters.{nl}
It's so fortunate that you are here.{nl}How come I can't hear anything from the soldiers who went to defeat Gorgon.
Mirtis is dead， but the bubbes are still following its order.{nl}And there's also a rumor that stronger bubbes were spotted at the 2nd lot.{nl}
The village will be in mess if those bubbes come out from the mine.{nl}Could you check the 2nd lot in 水晶礦山 if you are okay?
You can go down to 2nd lot from the isolated district in the 3層 in 水晶礦山.{nl}Okay， then I am counting on you.
They are more dangerous bubbes.{nl}We can't guarantee the safety of 克萊佩達.
The bubbes climbed upto the 1st lot? {nl}It's worse than I expected.
This is the scent I mixed exclusively for Bubbes. {nl}This will cause lethargy and fear.{nl}
It is a problem that it is still in the test stage， but you can't do anything about it at the moment.{nl}I will put it into the incense burner so please place it at 2nd lot in 水晶礦山.
I am researching with respect to various aspects so that it would never occur again.{nl}I can't think of a better way besides the scent at the moment.
Well done indeed.{nl}This is for testing so I don't know how long it would last， but I guess it would be safe for a while.
I am dizzy since the Pantos are keep trying to get out from Gelli Plateau.{nl}If they go into the region where people live， that will be a big problem.{nl}
So I am thinking about sprinkling the scent of Moas onto the way to Gelli Plateau.{nl}Moas are the biggest enemies of Pantos. I will think about a way to prevent it from going out somehow.
Are you going to help me? Then It will be grateful.{nl}Moas are spotted near Piene Fields. I want you to get their lumps.
Just get the lumps of Moas.{nl}I will do the rest.
Well done.{nl}I will do the rest. Thank you.
I am blocking Pantos from getting out of Gelli Plateau with Era.{nl}I will put something on the way which Pantos will be scared.{nl}
They are the things that can't be done by me...
Really? First， I need Fishermen's eyes and the essences of Ellums. {nl}I heard they live at 卡丁森林入口.
I never went upto 卡丁森林入口 so I am scared.{nl}I heard that is the road where spirits lost their ways.
Damn. Disgusting.{nl}I will make the strings which Pantos will be scared.
Okay. I made the strings.{nl}Now， could you put them on the Srautas Gorge and Nepritas Cliffs?
To tell you exactly.{nl}Hm... I will just mark it on the map.
Thanks for helping me.{nl}This must be effective so you can feel you did something worthwhile.
Do you know about Tilenis Prince who went missing while he was fleeing to 克萊佩達?{nl}The mayor went out to welcome him， but they all went missing.{nl}
But recently， the brooch of the mayor was discovered.{nl}But， we can't investigate it publicly... Can you investigate for us?
The place where the brooch was discovered is called Sidabra Rest Area in Veya Valleys.{nl}And please accept this.{nl}
These are the eyes of the spirits that were created by requesting to 邪靈祭司 導師.{nl}They make things visible. They will be helpful.
The spirit of 克萊佩達 Mayor
I am... Okay.{nl}He was fighting again. Prince...
Most of them died while returning with the colleagues of the prince.{nl}But， they weren't guided even after their deaths. {nl}
When they realized that， they continuously fought with them.{nl}The people who are serving the tree... they kidnapped the prince.
I can't stop this fight.{nl}Please save the prince...
The mayor... he already passed away.{nl}But， the prince may be still alive.{nl}
The people who are serving the trees. I guess I should investigate little more.{nl}Thanks for helping me.
I am okay even if I don't get guided.{nl}Please guide the prince...
The villagers of Andail Village who were slaughtered by the demons...{nl}I am sure they were scared. They must have had regrets.{nl}
We want to mourn for the ones who died.{nl}Don't you want to be with me.

The resentment of the villagers in Andail village is floating around as a negative energy.{nl}Fill the beads I will give to you with the essences of Tini， absorb their resentment and bring them to me.
They had so much pains and felt unfair.{nl}This should never occur again.
With your help， the fight with 博拉波 has ended.{nl}But， his thorny vines are spreading with vicious energy.{nl}
If we leave it like that， the whole forest will be covered with thorny vines.{nl}But， since my power is not complete yet... I want to ask help from you.
You should eliminate the thorny vines that are on the way to 關門路.{nl}If we don't block here， 希奧利艾 Forest will also be covered with the thorny vines.
The vicious energy that spurts out from the thorny vines is very bad for humans.{nl}I hope you will be okay.
This is just only the slightest part.{nl}If we don't get rid of the Thorny Forest completely， the thorny vines will keep spreading.
The source of all thorny vines is 博拉波... and Sirudgellar Forest where he used to stay.{nl}To purify the forest， please locate my crystal that has my power in it.
I am sorry that I put heavy burden on your shoulders. {nl}But， you will be able to do it.
Thanks for your efforts.{nl}I will be keep staying here until Thorny Forest recovers it's original status.
Unvisible substance... I mean spirits.{nl}I am researching about the relationship between the spirits and the magical power.
I just don't have time to get the essences that are needed for the experiment. {nl}I think you will be able to help me.
Bring this essence of chill.{nl}When you use this to the monsters in 光合森林， the spirits will be frozen.{nl}

When you defeat that monster， you will be able to obtain frozen spirit fragments.{nl}Put that into the magical power condenser. I've used them long time ago， but some of them should be still remaining.
I've used it long time ago so it may show some strange results.{nl}That's why I needed your help.
This innocent essence of chill... It is as I thought.{nl}Ah， you were almost on the blink of the death. That's why I called you.
As I was tiding up the objects of my older brother， strange beads came out.{nl}It was written on the memo that the beads are there to find the hidden objects of him easily.{nl}
But the manual... It will be hard for me.{nl}So how about you have it?
I mean. They told me to defeat the monsters near this bead.{nl}Then the monsters' magical power will recharge the bead. It's too hard for me.
I know it's sad， but we should live on. {nl}I can't just stay sad when I think about my brother.
Is recharging enough?{nl}I feel sad again as I look at that bead again.
The bead will tell us where the hidden objects of my brother are located.{nl}I don't know what's gonna come out， but please use them well.
If I can't have it， I hope it gets used for a better objective.{nl}I am sure my brother also thinks like that.
My disciple created the magic summon field， but something is wrong.{nl}Maybe... it is connected to the different world. {nl}
If it goes wrong， the demons would come out to this world.{nl}Please. I will stop the summon ritual here so please break the magic field at Aqueduct region.
We can't do anything if the portal completely opens.{nl}What the hell is happening at Aqueduct region?
Succeeded?{nl}I think there's something that connects to the other world at Aqueduct region.{nl}What the hell is that...
Disciple Ramelie
The sealed tower that was protected by the revelator is being attacked again.{nl}But， it can't be protected by us and the villagers.
The first seal of the sealed tower is already destroyed by the attacks from the demons.{nl}The second seal still remains， but I don't know how long we can hold up.
The 女神 asked us to protect the seal. {nl}Now， only one we can trust is you， the revelator.
Is the seal okay?{nl}I don't know how many times I've prayed to wish that you are okay.
Now is the time to restore the first seal.{nl}I know it's going to be hard， but I can't seek help for this.
Are you really going to help? How grateful...{nl}First fill the crest of Austeya 女神 with the sacred energy near the altar.{nl}
When you dedicate the completed crest of the 女神 to the sealed tower， the seal will be filled again.{nl}
Even if you've done the dedication， you can't seal the vicious energy completely. {nl}This attack will not be the last. I hope the 女神 return fast.
We can't just rely everything on the 女神.{nl}But， I don't know if we could hold up anymore.
I am so grateful since you are helping us with the restoration of the seal.{nl}But， I don't know how long this seal would hold up... I hope Austeya comes back soon.
I will comfort this.{nl}
Their pain， resentment， wrath and sadness...{nl}I hope they all forget in the arms of the 女神.
The Chapparitions in Esanchiu village took away lots of lives.{nl}Defeat them in the name of the 女神es.

I'm sorry...but，{nl}Can you burn this oration in front of the epitaph in Nepatogu Fields of Rukas Plateau? {nl}You have explored different areas of the valley. I think you are more than qualified to comfort their souls.

Search the keepstakes which possess the magical power of Balyus

Stop the magic generating stones in the room of senses

使用 brooch with Balryus' magical power at the room of senses to find the real magic generating stones and stop them. If you stop fake stones， all magic generating stones will start to generate magical power again.

You stopped magic generating stones in the room of senses and now is the time to stop the stones in the room of rituals. Listen to Jane's spirit.
Stop the magic generating stones in the room of rituals

The magic generating stones in the room of senses influence the other magic generating stones nearby. If you accidently touch on them， you could reset them using the brooch with Balryus' magical power.
You've stopped all magic generating stones in the room of senses. Go back to Jane's spirit.
