Tell Sigis Yuta's apology
As I look around， I can see the sacred object of 澤米娜 Goddess. I am gonna go there to examine it.{nl}Since it belongs to 澤米娜， she will give me some answer!{nl}

I am worried that the corpses may wake up again and interrupt the ritual.{nl}When you go to the burial chamber over there， you will see coffins where the corpses are in.{nl}Please destroy those coffins before the corpses wake up.

I can see the sacred object with the shape of a tree over there.{nl]I think that is the sacred object which the Tree Sect of the Truth received from 澤米娜 Goddess.{nl}Trees symbolize 澤米娜 女神 so I am sure the 女神 gave them the sacred object!

While you are destroying the coffins， be careful that the lids of the coffins do not open.{nl}I destroyed a few coffins myself， and I found out that the corpses out from the coffins and attack when the lids are open.
The corpses didn't attack since you've destroyed the coffins.{nl}But， I couldn't check the sacred object. I could not get near to the sacred object.{nl}It was like as if something was pushing me.

The grave guard who manages here， Catacomb may know a little about that sacred object and the barrier.{nl}But， I can't talk to the grave guard.{nl}The grave guard shouted at me while I was preparting for the ritual after entering here.{nl}Could you find out about the sacred object of the 女神 from the grave guard on behalf of me?

When I entered Catacomb to look for the traces of the 女神， what I encountered were the corpses that were interrupting the ritual.{nl}After seeing teh corpses walk out from the coffins， I destroyed the coffins before they wake up.{nl}The grave guard who saw that shouted at me madly because I didn't show respect to the dead ones.{nl}I did that because I thought that was better than seeing the corpses wake up again...

The sacred object of the 女神? What the hell. Are you on the same side with that rude 邪靈祭司?{nl}If that's so， get our from this place. I get mad whenever I think about that 邪靈祭司.{nl}He destroyed all the coffins where the corpses were in.{nl}I can't understand how he could do such thing!
Please tell well to the grave guard. I have to find 澤米娜 Goddess.{nl}The underground is also the territory of 澤米娜 女神 so the reason why the corpses here are resurrecting is because the 女神 is not here.

This is absurd. The dead ones are waking up again...{nl}If someone did this purposely， nothing will be more insulting than this!{nl}Who would you suspect the most when the corpses are waking up from the grave?

If this was really done by 邪靈祭司， then I should help the corpses to rest again.{nl}They may resurrect again if I bury them under the ground so please purify their bodies with your respect using this torch.
Why are you hesitating! Move fast! I can't see it anymore...
Thank you for helping their rest on behalf of me...{nl}It was hard for me as a grave guard to point the sword at those people who I should take care for.

I saw the sacred object of the 女神 which 邪靈祭司 said before. That's the sacred object created by the guys in the Tree Sect of the Truth.{nl}They said they are the official disciples of 澤米娜 Goddess and since this grave belongs to the 女神， they will ask the 女神 to bless the plce.{nl}I think the corpses started to wake up after the guys set the sacred object here.{nl}But， I can't get near to that sacred object.{nl}

...Ah! That's right!{nl}When you go deep inside， you will see the box that contains the objects which my father used to use.{nl}Please pull out the spell doll from there. I should go， but I am scared to walk through the corpses...

From long time ago， the lunatic 邪靈祭司 or 死靈法師 used to come to Catacomb secretly sometimes.{nl}The did some insane experiments on the corpses here.{nl}My father created the spell doll to protect Catacomb from the ones who try to mess up this sacred grave.{nl}When you put magical power into the spell doll， it will find the energy that is messing up the grave and destroy that energy.

Our family is guarding the grave for generations. On the Day of Divine Tree， my father got into the incident and passed away so I am guarding the grave after that. I didn't learn anything from him， but now I am the guardian here...
Yes! This spell doll is it! I haven't used it for a long time， so I gotta check whether it's working properly.

Now bring this doll to the place where the sacred object is.{nl}If the cause of the awakening of the corpses here is that sacred object， the spell doll will break the barrier and destroy the sacred object.
This is the spell doll that my father used to use. We won't have any problem if we just follows how my father used to do... Just like how my father used to do...

What...? What did you just say?{nl}The spell doll broke the barrier and attacked the sacred object， but the doll was destroyed instead?{nl}That's impossible... Maybe it was really the sacred object of the 女神 so that's why the doll was destroyed...{nl}But the fact that the doll broke the barrier means its power is the vicious energy...{nl}
If this is related to the 女神， I can't handle it myself.{nl}Since the barrier was destroyed， ask 邪靈祭司 to check the sacred object as well.
Wow... You broke the barrier. That's splendid.{nl}Hmm... About the doll... Maybe the doll was impaired. It is the sacred object of 澤米娜 女神， but what do you mean by vicious energy.{nl}
Anyways， since the barrier was destroyed， let's go with me. I will check it myself.{nl}Can you go there first? I will go right away when I am done preparing for the ritual.
The spell doll... Vicious energy... Ahhaha... The grave guard is so funny...
I saw it... That monster... It was the grave guard... The sacred object a while ago is not 澤米娜's! I am sorry for being selfish...

Due to my wrong faith， I didn't suspect the vicious sacred object and broke the coffins... I am disappointed myself...{nl}Now， since the vicious sacred object is gone， my abilities would help calm down the mess.{nl}
To express my apology， I want to help the grave guard.{nl}Can you pass my apology to him?
Those gentiles! They used the name of the 女神 and did this...{nl}They should not insult the dead ones like this. I want chase them right away and make them pay for it...{nl}

But， as a grave guard， I think we should first stabilize Catacomb.{nl}Thanks. I realized that I also have to take care for the resurrected ones' rest as a grave guard.{nl}Since 邪靈祭司 said he would help me， I will protect the ones that have remained.{nl}
The Tree Sect of the Truth crossed here
and entered the Mausoleum of Karail

.{nl}They are going to looking for something that will be used to spread their doctrines...{nl}If you get a chance to go to the Mausoleum of Karail， please investigate about them.{nl}I think they are insane.
You are not here... Where have you disappeared to... 澤米娜 Goddess...

I can't move at all due to the barrier.{nl}Please do something about it.
Damn. I think the monsters are rushing in.{nl}I guess they found out that I got released.
Where is the master. I am so scared because I am worried.
This obstacle was indeed the one that can be only passed by the revelator.{nl}The obstacle that was prepared by the owner of the Mausoleum.
Are you hurt somewhere?{nl}Oh， that's the 2nd proof of the obstacle of the great king.
Soon all the proofs of the obstacles will be collected.{nl}I'll be looking forward to it.
Finally， We've collected all the proofs of the obstacles.{nl}Give me the proofs. I will start the interpretations.

$This place has become dangerous ever since Medzio Diena, when the monsters emerged.{nl}Go back quickly while you still can, Kepas will overrun this position soon.
$Ah, you said you came to tell me about the order to assemble, right?{nl}If you help me find my belongings, I will be able to do so more quickly.
$Have you ever tried offering worship to a Goddess Statue?{nl}The Goddesses might have vanished, but I believe they are still out there somewhere.
I was worried that the monsters caused harm to the Goddess Statue.{nl}Even though the world is messed up.. It's terrible.
$This has really gotten out of hand.{nl}Who knew that Kepas could grow so big...{nl}I wonder if it's because of Medzio Diena?
Don't forget to worship a Goddess Statue when you see one.{nl}I'm sure doing so will bestow a blessing upon you.{nl}I firmly believe that the Goddesses have not forsaken us.
This is not the type of monster that can be encountered here so it is rather strange.{nl}I think the world is being ruined.
$We need to assemble already?{nl}The world may be on the brink of destruction, but I can't accept this kind of insane order. {nl}I have enough missions on my hands as it is.
Alright. This should be enough.{nl}Here is a pill that instantly restores your stamina...{nl}I'll give you one as a gift since I have enough.{nl}

You can recover stamina through Tree Root Crystals or by taking a rest.{nl}But, you won't have time for that when you are being chased by monsters. {nl}This potion will come in handy in situations like that.
$I heard the news from my men and I was starting to become worried.{nl}With how messed up the world is, if that ended well, all is well.{nl}
$It's not like there weren't any monsters at all four years ago, but they weren't so ferocious. {nl}Plant-type monsters seem to have been affected the most, as they weren't like this before.

That's it, that's how you do it. Easy, right?{nl}There is no way to tell what is going to become of this world now that the Goddesses have left,{nl}so we have to steadily put effort into things ourselves.
A shield that is advanced to level 4 will be enough.{nl}The determination should be checked.
You are so determined unlike other guys nowadays.{nl}You can come to learn from me anytime you want.
$During your travels you might discover Goddess Statues scattered all over the kingdom.{nl}Worship these statues and you will certainly receive their blessings.
Press {img F10 40 40} to open the Help menu for more information.
The Writings on the Wall
Which factors are decisive for determining the outcome of battle?{nl}If you just continue to attack thoughtlessly, then you may get attacked instead.
Golems in this situation...{nl}You remember what I taught you right?
$You are doing great.{nl}As a Paladin Master, I must pay respect to your achievements.
Thank you for passing Laimonas' regards.{nl}You should enter Klaipeda.{memo Uska is a knight, keep the Sir} Sir Uska is waiting for the Revelators.
$There might be more of these Large Kepas roaming in the area nearby.{nl}Could you take a look for me, please?{nl}
$It was just as I thought, right? It was this instinct that kept me alive during Medzio Diena.
$It's been too long, my men should've come back, but I haven't heard anything from them yet.{nl}I know it's been four years since Medzio Diena, but my men have been getting too relaxed recently.
The Goddesses disappearing, things like golems appearing... {nl}Is there really any hope?
How was it? Were there many skills that seemed useful?{nl}If you use skills effectively, they will be very useful in combat.{nl}
If that's the case, you will become bait and take care of the Royal Mausoleum defense device at Sesija Entrance.{nl}I will only say this once, so you better listen carefully.
No one can disturb the eternal sleep of the great king.

Pursue Rexipher at the Royal Mausoleum Entrance
Do you know the legend of Cunningham? {nl}It's a legend about how a great demon was trapped in the Crystal Mine in the past. {nl}

I assume that the trapped demon has finally woken up to control the Vubbes. {nl}The dream of the Bishop and the Legend of Cunningham... {nl}I wonder if it is a forewarning of a great event that's about to happen.{nl}
Only the Goddess knows if it will be hope or despair. {nl}You can read the details about it in a book found at Mine Worker's Resting Place on 2F.
Anyway, it seems like the Vubbes surely destroyed the purifiers. {nl}You better fix it first before the hostages run out of air.
I will protect this village for my dead comrades.
If the 邪靈祭司 Master told you that I would know it..{nl}There's one place that comes to mind.{nl}
You're saying something that's really hard to believe. {nl}You mean this revelation is Goddess Laima and we have to collect all these for the Goddess to return?{nl}
Goddess Laima is often called the recorded Goddess. {nl}When the Great King Zachariel formed this kingdom, the only record about it is that Goddess Laima blessed it.  {nl}
I'd like to ask you a favor. {nl}I have sinned because I was not able to fulfill my duties of guarding the kingdom on Medis Diena. {nl}
But I am not a Revelator. {nl}Even if I want to make up for my sins, my duty at the moment is to protect the many citizens of 克萊佩達. {nl}
So please find all the revelations. {nl}I will put my position as the Knight Commander of 克萊佩達 on the line and help you deal with it.
If you're on your way to 克萊佩達, let me ask you a favor. {nl}It's not easy to go to 克萊佩達 because of the Infrorocktors.
I feel so relieved to be stationed in the Western Woods.{nl}There are some places where you'd rather die than to be stationed.
Aren't you hurt?{nl}I appreciate that you got rid of the Poatas but what were you thinking?
You mean you want to enter the Crystal Mines to find the evidence of Salvation? {nl}
But that's tough at the moment. {nl}There is a swamp of Vubbes rushing out of the Crystal Mines.{nl}
And there's an increase of the monsters here in the Easter Woods that are now threatening even 克萊佩達. {nl}The Miners' Village in the middle has turned into a battlefied. {nl}
We have divided the troops into two. {nl}Half of the troops are guarding the Miners' Village {nl}and the other half are searching why the number of monsters increased in Eastern Woods.

So we are not in the situation to spare our troops for guarding Revelators while they check the evidence of salvation. {nl}But we also can't go against the order of the Bishop and Knight Commander either. {nl}
Hmm, what about this? {nl}
To test whether you can safely reach Miners' Village even without the aid of guards... {nl}Why don't you help us in our search?
Good job. {nl}Now, let's get to the main task.
Oh, let me give you some helpful information in return for your your help.{nl}The evidence of salvation that the Revelators are looking for might be found in the Closed Area.
It wasn't so long ago. {nl}I felt a strange energy while experimenting near the Closed Area. {nl}It was quite different from the spell we know of. It was very warm.{nl}
The Miners' Village is under siege and dangerous.{nl}Please wait in 克萊佩達 until the siege is over.
謝謝你 for your determination to learn my swordsmanship, but I am not sure if you would follow well.{nl}I will test you by seeing how you face the Vubbes at Crystal Mine 1F.
Have you met Jonas in the Gateway of the Great King? {nl}It definitely isn't a sickness. {nl}But it also isn't magic of the present times.
If this note is true, we might die any time.{nl}By the way, what happened to the person who wrote it?
Because of that, a few disciples have died.{nl}But, it's strange. It seems that it never happened.
Well done.{nl}Now, is this going to be the last lesson...
Bring me hard shell of Varvs and rigid horns of Zinutekas from the Royal Mausoleum 1F.{nl}It shouldn't be hard since you are my disciple.
It's time for you to 強化 the qualities of Manas that you possess as a Linker.{nl}Any magic is okay. I will test you by dueling.
It is a shame to look back once a man starts his journey.{nl}My brother will rather choose to die than look back.
I'm sure my brother stood firm and accepted his final moments. {nl}However, I still think he could've lived more meaningfully {nl}if he had just turned away from his ambition...
I'm thinking of converting the Demons using the power of the altar. {nl} The converted Demons will absorb the divine power and slowly start to die. {nl}
So you found the Seal of Space. {nl}Honestly, I did not believe it when my friend, the Paladin Master, said a Savior would come. {nl}
That's how bad the situation was. {nl}My family and friends all went to the Goddess... {nl}It seemed like there was no hope anymore in this world. {nl}
Here, use the Seal of Space on the pillar beside me and go to the sanctuary. {nl}It is prepared only for the Revelator.
I was there when the Divine Tree was destroying the capital. {nl}But I was not able to stop it. I was not able to save everyone.{nl}This will remain in my heart like a needle and it hurts me forever.
But you were different. You have the power to save everyone. {nl}All the followers, the watchers, even the wishes that me and the first Paladin longed for... {nl}
Right. {nl}Did you mention that you need to find Goddess Saule? {nl}
The colorful stream mentioned in the revelation starts at above the Veja Ravine. {nl}Well then, may the blessings of Goddess be with you.
When you find the revelation, tell Paladin Master of the story you've been through so far. {nl}He must be the one most anxious about it. {nl}
I will gather all the prayers for my family and friends and offer it to you. {nl}May the blessings of Goddess be with you...
But this old body of mine does not follow my will anymore. {nl}Now I can only trust my old friend Algis and you. {nl}
Go. The Tenet Cathedral is in Tenet Garden.{nl}My lifelong wish.. Be sure to stop the revelation from falling into the hands of Gesti.
Please bring me the Mali seeds in the way to Labure roads. {nl} They would be a good source of magic for the 薩滿 doll. {nl} {nl}
Won't you help me purify Labure road? {nl} The 薩滿 doll finds the evil force but we have to purify it ourselves.
We need the rope for ceremony to make the 薩滿 doll. {nl} It's on the waist of the Panto 薩滿 in the Cottage. {nl} Bring it to me.
I came back because the elders told me to restore the dolls used for spells.{nl}A doll for spells. Isn't it exciting?
I can't stand seeing the Panto totems pressed with evil energy. {nl} I'm going to break it through the 薩滿 doll. Want to give it a try?
I heard the first Paladin promised three things in return for saving our family. {nl}
Our 薩滿 dolls are different from 邪靈祭司's 薩滿 dolls. {nl}
You can summon the 薩滿 doll with this summon scroll. {nl}
Understanding the root of everything becomes the power of Elementalist. {nl}Wind, Water, Fire, Earth. We pull the strongest powers from the simplest forms.
This forest is also growing dark. {nl}Many people should realize that Medis Diena is the start of a disaster. {nl}
Too bad that Gesti wasn't killed, but still you did a great job.{nl}It will end soon..
Without Airine, I would have died.{nl}Of course, I really appreciate for your help.
It's all my fault.{nl}Schmid is dead.. what should I do alone.
I don't think prayers and ceremonies are the only way to serve the Goddess. {nl}Serving the world through physical training is also an important mission of the cleric.
There are two ways to approach the Goddess. {nl}Strong belief for the Goddess and the sound of silver dropping on the offering box. Just that.
The magic to control time is the essence of all magics.{nl}It's what Agailla Flurry told me.
I heard a Revelator defeated the Demon Lord slurring the Royal Mausoleum.{nl}As a person undergoing training, I am ashamed that I can't go out and fight.
The Bishop is praying in closure. {nl}When you are ready, please go to Aras in the Eastern Woods.
I'll give you more than what the Knights asked for so please help us find the Goddesses. {nl}{nl}Welcome!{nl}Oh, you're the Revelator. I really wanted to meet you.{nl}
克萊佩達 is full of hope and expectations for the Revelators who dreamed of the Goddess. {nl}I am also one of them. {nl}
We'll give you more than what the Knights asked for. {nl}Since we have many Revelators, things will get better, right?
You mean you actually drove away the Demon Lord from the Crystal Mine... {nl}謝謝你 for reminding me of something that I had forgotten for a while. Hope.
The first Paladin and the Tenet Chapel fulfilled their duties. {nl}Right.. The time has finally come. Together with the Revelator.
I heard the monsters in Kateen Forest are eating up the Owl Sculptures I've made. {nl}I'm sure they are trying to use the souls for something else. Like using it for nourishment...
Did you know? A Revelator defeated the Demon Lord in the Crystal Mine. {nl}Do you think that disaster also comes with hope?
When I first saw the Revelators, I wondered if they were worthy of that name. {nl}But they saved the Crystal Mine and the Tenet Chapel. {nl}There is definitely a savior whom the Goddess sent.
I heard some Revelator defeated the Demon Lord in Crystal Mine. {nl}That's incredible. Aren't Demon Lords the greatest among the demons?

Did you hear about the Revelator who stopped the Demon Queen at Tenet Chapel? {nl}It would have been better if she was killed for good, {nl}but it was the Demon Queen, someone that even the Paladin Master wasn't able to defeat. {nl}That is awesome enough.
As a Hunter, my instinct says the monsters in this forest is showing unusual movements. {nl}As if pushed by something.
I feel ashamed that I wasn't able to join the squad in Tenet Chapel. {nl}But isn't it amazing? The Tenet Chapel was saved from that Demon Lord.
Just as I thought. The monsters in this forest were chased by the Vubbes. {nl}And to see that the Revelator actually defeated the Demon Lord that planned all this.{nl}I really wonder who that is.

If it was my hometown, if a demon occupied the Mines, everyone would have attacked it and celebrated. {nl}Anyway, I don't know who that Revelator is but this weak kingdom finally found someone useful.

A sacred chapel had to go through such bad things. The clerics of this kingdom are planning something unusual.{nl}But it's a good thing to have protected the Tenet Chapel. It means they have the guts, don't you think? {nl}{nl}
The Vubbes suddenly rushed out of the Mines. {nl}I have no idea what's going on. Do you have anything that comes to mind?
We won't know if the Revelators really dreamed of the Goddess. It could even be a trick of the Demons. {nl}But didn't someone among them save the Tenet Chapel. {nl}From the Demon Lord even.

It's a relief a Revelator drove away the Demon Lord from the mines. I was scared another Medis Diena would happen. {nl}But I felt something warm... Was it just my delusion? {nl}It was a pure and good energy.
It's such good news that a Revelator helped drive away the Demon Lord of the Crystal Mine.{nl}But a strange and sacred enery was felt... Could it have been just a delusion? {nl}It is very vague.

Do you think Medis Diena and the Demons are related? {nl}I mean the Tenet Chapel. It was as if the demons were waiting for that moment...{nl}Come to think of it, the Revelators could have been ones prepared for such situation.
I made it through the wild monsters and you made through the Thorn Forest. {nl}I'm sure you're not looking for the Goddess... Then what's the matter?

I heard the historians were attacked by the Demon Lord at King's Plateau. {nl}So it means the disaster was forewarned a thousand years ago? {nl}Anyway, it's a relief the Revelator was able to block it.

In between this valley area and 克萊佩達 is the Thorn Forest that is full of evil energy. {nl}It was just a normal and peaceful forest before but..{nl}You making it through the forest... Does it mean the forest is now purified?

There is still so much left unrevealed about the Great King Zachariel.{nl}But since the demons lived longer than us... This must have been what they were preying at. {nl}I don't know who it is but it's a good thing the Revelator stopped it. We might even have had another Medis Diena.
I heard the source of the evil energy deep in the Thorn Forest recently disappeared. {nl}But it will need a long time for the forest to return to its previous state...

Did you hear that a Revelator stopped the Demon Lord's plan in Royal Mausoleum? {nl}I heard that Demon Lord was going around destroying the ruins in King's Plateau. Now we finally taught him a lesson.
How did you come here? Did you make it through the Thorn Forest? {nl}Hmm. Are you saying you can't tell me about it.

The Demon Lord that was messing the King's Plateau seems to have been the reason behind all the cases of people missing. {nl}It serves him right that a Revelator stopped all his plans from going through.
Since Goddess Saule disappeared, areas centering around Kvailas Forest was filled with evil energy and thorns. {nl}But you made it through the Thorn Forest? Can we say that it's a good sign? {nl}
A Revelator saved the Royal Mausoleum of King Zachariel. {nl}But why would the demons go after the ruins that's over a thousand years old? {nl}There is too much that we don't know about. {nl}
I heard the monsters keep attacking the ruins and the historians keep disappearing. {nl}But also, nobody remembers. How funny.
I heard a Revelator drove out the Demon Lord that was trying to rule over the Royal Mausoleum. {nl}That's funny. Doesn't it mean that it was foreseen since a thousand years ago?

If the Demon Lord invaded the Royal Mausoleum, then the symptoms of Jonas in Gate Route also becomes clear. {nl}If King Zachariel erased the memory of the workers in the Mausoleum, then it must be a side effect of the old magic. {nl}What do you think he was planning to do?
Now the demons even wear the mask of a human. {nl}I heard some Revelator stopped the Demon Lord in the Royal Mausoleum,{nl} but I wonder how many demons are now hiding amongst humans.
This place holds records of the hidden side of history. {nl}Time is an absolute thing. It just depends on how you look at it.

I heard a Revelator stopped the Demon Lord that was eyeing the Royal Mausoleum. {nl}It may be a bit overboard to make a connection between Medis Diena and a king from a thousand years ago... {nl}But I'm sure there is something that we are all forgot.
The demons have been continuously attacking the Mage Tower even before Medis Diena.{nl}Thanks to the Goddess sending us the Revelator, we finally make an end to the long battle.
The weight of history feels greatly heavy when you stand in this place. {nl}Maybe you can find a clue about Medis Diena.

I keep getting the thought that Medis Diena might have just been a process.{nl}If not, then why would the demons go after a mausoleum that is over a thousand years old? {nl}It's a good some thing some Revelator stopped it.
Everyone know that Helgasercle showed an obsession towards the Mage Tower since centuries ago. {nl}Whatever is in that tower, we can finally see the end of it. {nl}That's a great thing.

From the Tenet Chapel and now to the Great Cathedral... But they say it was resolved well by the Revelator, so I hope things get better. {nl}Not minding the talks of the world and doing what you must is what's good for the Goddess and the kingdom.

The story that a Revelator saved the Mage Tower is something that even someone like me, {nl}who is not interested in the gossips of the world, can hear. {nl}It's a surprise that there was a least one person who was good enough from anybody there.
Hergasercle was an incarnation of obsession. {nl}The chain of obsession was broken thanks to the Revelator but its souls is not something that can be saved.

I heard a Revelator defeated the Demon Lord that dirtied the wise teachings of Maven. {nl}Now it is time for us priests to come forward. {nl}We should put away our regrets about failing to protect the Great Cathedral and atone our sins.
My colleague is dead?{nl}That can't be. Only if I had not tempted him...{nl}
This map is useless to me now, without my colleague.{nl}Please pray that my colleague goes to the Goddess safely.
I can't leave with everything behind...
What do we do? {nl}The Vubbes rushed in and kidnapped the villagers!
You are the Revelator, right? {nl}The Goddess must have helped. {nl}
This is all because of the dream of the bishop of 克萊佩達. {nl}What is he talking about evidence of salvation in the Crystal Mine. I have never seen such thing. {nl}
I'm not sure if that is the reason but the Vubbes suddenly rushed out of the Crystal Mine. {nl}Those Vubbes took all the villagers they see into the mines. {nl}
Please... Save the villagers. {nl}I beg of you!
Let's go to the Crystal Mine. {nl}I will tell you the rest of the story in the Crystal Mine entrance.

Hold on! There is something you should know. {nl}We went into the mines to save the kidnapped villagers too.{nl}But the purifiers were broken and the mine was filled with toxic fumes, so we failed every time. {nl}
Ye..Yes..{nl}Find a young man named Vaidotas!{nl}
That fellow knows well about the purifiers in the Crystal Mine. {nl}It hasn't been long since he was taken away by the Vubbes so he must be in the Vubbe Outpost.
{memo X}{memo X}You want to learn my skills?{nl}It's not hard for me to teach you, but would you be able to handle it?
The Goddess always told us to help those around us.{nl}By helping others near you, you will help your spirit as well.
Great King Zachariel's ordeal will not be easy.{nl}With the skill you have, he should have acknowledged you.
The kingdom has lost all its hope. {nl}It does not have any will to stand back anymore and is just crying out for the Goddess.{nl}
It is during this time that the people came forward saying they dreamed of the Goddess. {nl}It is you, the Revelator. {nl}
Anyway, the bishop himself also had a dream while praying in closure. {nl}In his dream, the Goddess told him the evidence of salvation will be found in the Crystal Mine. {nl}
Knight Aras in the Eastern Woods is in charge of it so go and meet him.
Four years ago after the incident, why is the Goddess sending us Revelators now... {nl}A peasant like me may not be able to understand the deeper meaning of the Goddess' will.
But, at least I know that the Revelators are our only hope.{nl}
Well then, go on to the Eastern Woods. {nl}Don't forget to worship the Statue of Goddess Ausrine in the central plaza before you leave. {nl}
Also, be sure to drop by the Tools Merchant.{nl}I have left some warp scrolls for the Revelators.
I can feel Bramble suffering.{nl}He is getting retribution for extracting all vigor from this land.
I am not afraid of dying.{nl}The Goddess Saule will guide me well.
The portal that you tried to open is the gate of lies.{nl}That portal leads to where all the knowledge of the world is.
I have been fighting Demon Lord Bramble that tried to take over the revelation. {nl}I have fought with it nights and days to hand the revelation to you. {nl}
But, Medis Diena broke the balance of strength. {nl}The Goddesses has lost most of their strength since that day. {nl}
Bramble took that chance to steal the revelation and seal me in this place. {nl}Because only I know how to interpret the revelation.{nl}
But I did not give into Bramble's order to interpret the revelation.{nl}That is why he made a plot to open a portal that leads to where all knowledge of the world is. {nl}
The residents of this area is the plot to open that portal. {nl}To find a way to get the revelation using your power as the savior... Something brutal was done. {nl}
I lost most of my strength and couldn't stop that horror from happening. {nl}All I could do was... to despair. {nl}
But the revelation led you to me. {nl}I am certain that you are the ray of light who will save all of the world. {nl}
Savior. {nl}Please destroy the magic that is trapping me. {nl}In order to deliver and follow the revelation, I must first be freed.
The magic circle of confinement is located in Drugys Courtyard and Vapsva lot. {nl}Please hurry before I lose consciousness.
{memo X}{memo X}謝謝你 for saving me. {nl}You are... The only true savior who will save the world. {nl}The one who Goddess Laima talked about.
{memo X}{memo X}I am Saule, the Goddess of the Sun.{nl}I was the guardian of the revelation.
This cage is still confining me. {nl} We've got to find Clymen who has the key and is hiding in between the gap of dimensions.
Please bring me the sacrifice tools in the Altar Grand Corridor. {nl} I will try to use the divine power that dwell in the tool.
I am finally free. {nl}I will prepare to interpret the revelation from this point on. {nl}
As I have told you before, the revelation is in the hands of Demon Lord Bramble. {nl}I feel sorry that I have to burden you, but your strength is the only thing I can rely on.{nl}
But Bramble is also not in its usual condition due to the previous battle. {nl}It is recovering by turning the forest into a thorn forest and extracting nourishments.
My believers are waiting for you in Gate Route. {nl}Please take back the revelation from him.
I haved carved many owls for a long time to help Goddess Arusine.{nl}At one point in time, they got their lives and determination.{nl}
Medis Diena was just the beginning. {nl}A forest far away from the capital such as this one is also starting to soak its way into the evil energy. {nl}
I will be able to guide you to the revelation if I use all the strength left in me. {nl}That is why you should release me.

But please don't reveal my existence for now. {nl}It is in nature of humans to want to depend on somewhere. {nl}If they find out about the helplessness of the Goddess, the world will be full of moans and confusion.
That portal is.. a fantasy... No. A portal going to Goddess Saule. {nl} Anyway, opening the portal is very important.

If armor protect you from physical attacks, accessories protect you from magic attacks. {nl} I hope it would be useful for you.{nl}Nice to meet you!{nl}Are you the Revelator who dreamed of the Goddess? {nl}
Everyone in 克萊佩達 is talking about it. {nl}I wonder if the Revelators really saw the disappeared Goddesses in their dreams... and where is that dream... {nl}
I am curious to know more about the dream but I'm sure they can't tell me about it.{nl}But that's fine since I believe that the Revelators are people who will find the Goddesses. {nl}
Please take this accessory. {nl}If the armor protects you from physical attacks, accessories protect you from magic attacks. {nl}
I hope it will be useful for you. {nl}May the blessings of Goddess be with you...
The poison of Scorpio, it was somewhat strange.{nl}Well. It already happened so what can I do anyway. I won't mind as long as it doesn't threaten my life.
Oh I'm causing such trouble.. 謝謝你 for helping me. {nl}You just have to make a magic circle with the firewood I give you and burn the voodoo doll on top of it.
The crops died when you did what you were told to do? {nl}It's okay. I was told that the bad aura within the crops will go away like that. {nl}
This is tough. {nl}Many might be killed..
Huh? You killed it because it tried to eat people? {nl}Ah.. well then, nevermind. I will report it to the baron myself.
This is the last one. {nl}The magic circle at Darbas Entrance will have a lot of monsters that will interfere. {nl}With the divine power suppressed, the monsters are naturally drawn to that area.
The baron is doing something to purify this farm. {nl}But recently the crops are dying and people are starting to fall sick. {nl}

If the magic circles are really a lie, then you should be able to remove the magic circles at Tylila Path with the Goddess' power. {nl}I mean something like the Goddess Statue. Is there any way to get it?
If I only had little more time...{nl}My documents... I can't leave them...
These things are useless to me now...{nl}Okay. Maybe you... My documents at Dykyne Fork...
Gerda
I am a new member of the Kedolaomer Merchants. {nl}I am setting up Warning and Notice Boards related to the Kedolaomers here and there. {nl}It is very tiring though.

{nl}If it is alright with you, can you set up some boards on the lower area over there? {nl}That's where Jurate is trying to excavate Divine objects so we need to put up a warning for pedestrians. {nl}But I need to go somewhere else...
謝謝你. {nl}That would be good enough.
Serapinas
I am Serapinas, one of the new members of the Kedolaomer Merchants. {nl}I am in charge of promoting the merchants. {nl}If you have time, can you help me in one of my promotion agenda?

{nl}It's nothing difficult. You just have to go near Orsha or 克萊佩達 and help the Revelators who just began their adventures. {nl}I will give you a scroll. If you use it on them, it will help them and promote the merchants as well.
You must use it near the fields of Orsha or 克萊佩達. {nl}And it must be someone who just began their adventure. {nl}I will not work on people who have seen the promotion material already.
謝謝你 for stepping up to help.
Oh, you're back already. {nl}Revelators sure are different.
Jurate
I am Jurate, the leader of divine object excavation team. {nl}Are you here to help? {nl}We need some.
{nl}Let's take time to talk later but first, please help excavate the area I tell you .
It would also be nice to take care of the monsters on your way there too.
It won't be that dangerous.
Oh, you brought it. {nl}This is a divine object known as the Incense of Goddess.
Did I tell you? {nl}Oh, it was a long day... {nl}We faced Medis Diena right here while we were transporting the divine objects to Orsha.

{nl}The wagon flipped and the divine objects scattered around. {nl}That's why we are going through this excavation to find it. {nl}But people are hesitating to excavate that area because of the monsters... Please help us.
I wonder if it was eaten by the monster...
Looks like the monsters ripped it to shreds but here. {nl}Let me try to have it back.
{nl}Since it is the record of the merchants, only if I could stick it back together...
This record is about the materials of the arrow that the merchants supplied to Lydia Schaffen and her arrow maker, the first Fletcher MAster.
I think there should be some divine objects up here too though. {nl}I can't tell where exactly. {nl}Can you look for it? I'll give you a detector.
Locate the area and then carefully dig that area. {nl}You will probably find the divine object.
Carefully use the detector as you go north.
Oh, you found it.
{nl}Let's see...
{nl}This divine object is an ink bottle. {nl}It contains the secret ink that was used for important records and documents. {nl}I assume this ink was used when they needed to hide the record.
{nl}Ah, I think that's about all the work we need to do for the day. {nl}謝謝你 for your help.
Marzelius
Hello. {nl}I am the Record leader Marzelius.
{nl}If you want to help me... {nl}Please find the records of the merchant that the monsters stole from us.
As Leopoldas says, we, the merchants, have been doing a lot of things. {nl}The records hold the history of our works.
If we get back the records that the monsters stole from us, then we must rewrite them again so that it will stand the times.
謝謝你 for coming forward to help us. {nl}We are in really tight hands.
Now we have to rewrite the damaged records... {nl}The ink made from monster fluids are good and lasts long. {nl}I will give you a trap to use so please get me the monster fluid.
If you place the trap near the monster, the monster will be lured to it and faint. {nl}You need to extract its fluid while it is still alive.
You can get it from all the monsters around the area.
This is good enough! {nl}非常感謝!
Now it's time to make the sanctuary. {nl}Try to make it here. {nl}I will give you the materials and tools you need.
You can make it here.
Good work. {nl}I have a feeling that Gierda, in the northern area, also needs your help.
Gierda
You're the Revelator. {nl}I am Giedra of Rud order. {nl}If you're here to meet Antanas, I'm sure you've already heard about our order so I won't talk so much about it.

{nl}I am collecting the materials needed to make the Scriptures of Goddess. {nl}Normal paper turns yellow and decays quickly... So I'm looking for materials that won't get wet nor be discolored easily. {nl}The transparent shell of the monsters are great for it. If you polish it well before writing on it, it will last a long time. {nl}Can you get me those? {nl}
It's a pretty common material so it will be easily to collect.
Bring it to me when you collect them all.
You brought them earlier than I expected. {nl}These shells will now be polished and used as pages of the scripture. {nl}謝謝你.

We also need to do some bookbinding. {nl}Making sure the book does not break lose is the most important thing. {nl}The leather string made from monster leather is the best but the problem is that it is too short. {nl}I will give you an anvil. Can you make me some bookbinding strings using the leather strings?

Listen carefully. First, get leather string from the monsters, then use this anvil to turn the leather strings into a strings for bookbinding. {nl}You need to connect the short strings and make it into a single string. {nl}It also becomes more durable this way.
Return to me when you are done making the string.
Awesome! {nl}You can say that you made a book yourself.
{nl}Kestas over there also needs your help. Try talking to him.
Kestas
I had the records of my seniors...{nl}But it was all stolen... {nl}I'm done...
Oh oh oh!{nl}Please help me!{nl}My seniors' records are all gone!
{nl}That's my job but it's all gone! All of it! {nl}Please find it! {nl}I'm sure the monsters took it!
What to do... What do I do... {nl}I'm done... All the hardworks put in to make those records...
{nl}That's it! Wow, you got them all! {nl}謝謝你!{nl}How can I 謝謝你 enough...
Aah it's all good now! Now go back to Orsha and complete the records!{nl}Hahaha!
Ah really... {nl}Actually, these records are made out of the polished shells of the monsters. {nl}You need to write it there to make it last long.
{nl}Yes, yes, right. That is also why Gierda is trying to make the scripture using the monster shells. {nl}That's why we are always attacked like this. {nl}Because they can smell their fellows...
{nl}Anyway, now I'll really go to Orsha now. {nl}非常感謝!
Chisel?{nl}The tools merchant should have it. {nl}Go on over there.
It's a long way back with the tool... {nl}Be careful.
A Chisel? {nl}You will use it to repair the sanctuary?
{nl}Well, I just bought some old chisels from other Revelators... {nl}If you need, you can take one of it.
Did you get the chisel?
Oh, you got them all.
It's a long way to Gernas Plains... {nl}Go on.
Albinas
謝謝你 for what just happened. {nl}Ah, this sanctuary...

{nl}I expected it to be polluted but.. I mean who would have thought it would be this bad? {nl}Making a sanctuary like this here is bad enough but those Nestos. {nl}What are they thinking leaving it corrupted like this.
{nl}Can you help me out for a while?
I belong to the Anastos. {nl}The Nestos still pursue unconditional belief even at this point when the Goddesses are all gone. {nl}That's why they are building sanctuaries here and there.
{nl}What's the use of sanctuaries when the Goddesses are all gone? {nl}When you know it will just be corrupted like this even if you build it. {nl}On the other hand, the Anastos pursue practicality.
{nl}People come first, mopping up the demons come first, and what's the use of faith when the Goddess themselves abandoned us?
There is another sanctuary over there. {nl}I will finish burning this sanctuary so please destroy the one over there. {nl}We need to teach those Nestos as lesson.
{nl}I'm sure the sanctuary over there is also fuming red enegy. {nl}A sign of corruption.
Damijonas
What the... {nl}Who are you? What are you doing to our sanctuary...
This is the sacred sanctuary of the Nestos. Did you do this?
I have never heard about someone like that. {nl}I may not know every singe person in Anastopas but I at least know those who set up this camp.
I'm at loss for any word.
{nl}Albinas? He is one of Anastopas? That can't be. {nl}Bring that person here. I need to check for myself.
Are you saying that Albinas guy is missing? {nl}It's getting out of hand. {nl}I'm sure Anastos won't do such a thing.
{nl}Anyway, our priority then is to restore this sanctuary. {nl}You did this so you should be responsible for it. {nl}There are rocks over there.

{nl}This sanctuary was also made of the rocks here so collect some rocks. {nl}And the Nestos Camp is over there. {nl}You'll find someone named Eduinas . {nl}Ask him to polish the rocks to use as materials for restoring the sanctuary.
If he finds out you did this to the sanctuary, he won't polish the rocks easily. {nl}But that's a price you have to pay and you should be responsbile for it.
Still not done yet?
Eduinas
Who are you..? {nl}And what are these rocks?
What? Destoryed the sanctuary? {nl}The sanctuary that was built with everyone's efforts here?

I don't need your apologies. {nl}I'll polish the rocks to use as materials since Damijonas said so but don't ever do that again. {nl}And while I polish these, I don't want to see your face so go away and take care of some monsters nearby.
You should wait longer.
Done. Now, don't ever do that again.
You brought it. {nl}Now let's begin the restoration.

Done. It's a good thing it wasn't totally destroyed. {nl}I apologize for being angry at you a while ago. Seeing the sanctuary destroyed was upsetting. {nl}But it's not total nonsense. {nl}Anastos and Nestos may be in conflict of interests but we do not invade each other's territory.
{nl}But you mentioned someone from Anastos that I don't even know as the reason behind destroying the sanctuary so I couldn't hold my anger. {nl}Anyway, at least you restored it...
{nl}But it strange. I have never heard of that name...{nl}Anastos Camp is in the northern side so why don't you go there and ask. {nl}It really is strange.
Gedas
Don't bother me if you don't have any business. {nl}Ah... I really need that...
{nl}Hey, can you find it for me? {nl}My research materials. {nl}The monsters took them all from me...
More than other things, we need to find it first! {nl}My research! My research! {nl}The monsters took it! {nl}Find me that first!
Are you not done yet?
Let me see... {nl}Yes, right! You got them all! {nl}非常感謝!
{nl}Oh, did you have something to ask?
Albi...nas...?
{nl}Uh...
{nl}Nope. I can't think of anyone on Anastos with that name. {nl}Moreover, he hold you go burn and destroy the Nestos sanctuary? {nl}Oh my god...

{nl}Nonsense. We don't do such a thing. {nl}I think we need to investigate on that matter. {nl}We give danger signal fires when we send out people for investigation {nl}and we ran out of it just now. {nl}Can you find some firepowder that are used to make the danger signal fires?
We all servce the Goddess. That is why we're on the pilgrimages. {nl}It's just a small difference in how we see the world.
{nl}Nestos people say that we should believe in the Goddesses unconditionally even if they disappeared, {nl}while we, the Anastos, pursue something more practical.
{nl}Defeating demons, improving the qualities of human lives... we have to aim for those things.
Monsters are all around so it will be difficult to obtain the materials.
But, Albinas... We don't feel good about it.
Okay, good. That's enough.{nl}Now, we will make flame bombs. Please wait a bit.
We've completed the flame bomb... Now I will call my colleague.{nl}He is called Fabius.
Fabius is a moderatist among Anastos, so he won't have problem even if he meets one of Nestos on his way.
Since Fabius left... we would somehow get some answer.{nl}But, I don't feel good about it. Is there any information...
{nl}Ah! Barte over ther must know something.{nl}He arrived here while travelling various locations.{nl}How about we ask about Albinas there?
It's just a different perspective of looking at the world. {nl}The topic they cover the most...

{nl}The disappearances of the Goddesses were done spontaneously so are we going to still follow then after they abondoned us...{nl}Another problem is whether we, humans should continue to manage the world where the Goddesses have disappeared...
{nl}Are we going to aim for the truth or trust the Goddessses and pray... that will be the difference.{nl}But, they are just conflicting each other and they don't deny each others' existences.
She is rather progressive.{nl}So since she is not close to me... I want you to go to her.
Barte
{nl}Ah, yes. I am called Barte.{nl}I was on a journey until recently. I am thinking about leaving againn.

Albinas... Is that him?{nl}When we arrived at the camp recently, one man was wearing the same outfit like us so I was going to say hello, but then I felt something was not right so I decided not to.{nl}He was giggling as he was looking at the leathers that were engraved with writings and he ripped off those leathers.

{nl}I was scared since that wasn't the power of a human, but he threw all those leathers on the ground and disappeared down there. The monsters thought that was the time and ate all the leathers. Was the smell of blood on those leathers?...
{nl}It was scary. {nl}Ah, I think the monsters there could've not digested the leathers as yet... {nl}Can you bring them? I am curious too.

The people who are progressive are a minority among Anastos.{nl}They are asserting to stop conflicting with Nestos, but instead try to change Nestos.{nl}So that Albinas probably told them he is also progressive.
{nl}So he could make you participate into destroying the sanctums of Nestos.
I can connect the burnt leathers together.
The monsters have those.
Let's see...
{nl}Uh?
{nl}Ah... This doesn't make sense... He...is a subordinate of Vaiga.{nl}Bring a conflict to Nestos and Anastos...{nl}You can use the Revelator...{nl}Vaiga.
Please tell this to Gedas!{nl}Oh my god, what is happening to Fabius?
We don't have time. Hurry.
What?{nl}Damn it...{nl}The demons came here...
Fabius... what is happening to him?{nl}What should I do...?
The flame bomb has exploded!{nl}Please hurry to Fabius!
{nl}And one more thing I should tell you...
{nl}To defeat the demons, Nestos may be better, when you stop by their camp and explain about the circumstances, they would tell you how to defeat Albinas.
Damn...{nl}That was his plot.{nl}I thought it was suspicious.
{nl}Please take this divine object.{nl}You would be able to defeat the demons.
You are safe.{nl}I've heard from Fabius.{nl}Everything was Vaiga's plot...{nl}We should be cautious all the time.{nl}謝謝你.
It's bad enough that they were killed by the Vubbes, but even their keepsakes are being abused. How awful...
謝謝你. {nl} My comrades will now be able to rest in peace.
It hurts to think about giving these keepsakes to my dead comrades' families.
非常感謝. {nl} My comrades can now rest in peace with the Goddesses.
Damn. {nl}It's too wide so let's move seperately.{nl}
First, you go deep into that place.{nl}Who knows? The demons with the special power may possess something.{nl}
I am so mad.{nl}There isn't anything special and the demons didn't have anything.{nl}
Did we search an empty area?
I will search the area up here.{nl}Let's meet later.
How about you?{nl}Have you obtained anything?
Wait!{nl}I can sense something big from Monocle.{nl}
It looks to be very big. Go there and check yourself.{nl}I will hide here since the battles are not my type.{nl}I don't know what to do if a strong demon comes out.
Monocle is looking for the hidden object that is hidden inside the special power. It is a big object.
Go there and chek.{nl}Like a while ago, the demons may appear and there may be really strong demons there... I will hide myself here.
An outsider comes here... Who are you?{nl}How did you come here?
It is really big so you will recognize it when you see it.
I will introduce myself first.{nl}I am the manager of the Fortress of the Great Earth.{nl}Who are you?{nl}
Okay. You don't have to explain anymore.{nl}I can feel you are full of sacred power.{nl}
I know the special power which Ruklys hid here exists.{nl}If it is your task to find it, then I will help for sure.
You can't say no nor ask for reasons to the kingdom orders.{nl}But as I lived here for my life, I have many things to think.{nl}
The kingdom order told us to ban anyone's entrance here, but I think the Goddess made us to meet each other here.{nl}The Goddess is not under the kingdom.{nl}
If it is about the Goddess, then I will do the guide.{nl}At least, there aren't anything here so let's go to the next area.
Ah, I totally forgot.{nl}I've prepared many things to block the intruders, but I totally forgot about them.{nl}
I need a cerificate.{nl}It was created to attack the ones who are not permitted ferociously.{nl}
To make a certificate, we first need a mushroom.{nl}There are many mushrooms at the lower area so please get me one.
I will help anything that is related to the Goddesses.{nl}Finally, an opportunity has come in my boring life.
They are enough to make the certificate.{nl}Please wait a bit.
What I can do for you is to put my sign on the certificate.{nl}But, I am too old to use magic.{nl}

But, I am sure the energy that is flowing around the Fortress of the Great Earth could substitute my weak power.{nl}Please gather all of those.{nl}The monsters who've lived here for a long time must have the crystal of the great earth.
I am not like the old days.{nl}When I made that certificate, I thought I would never make anymore.
I never knew that I would be making this again... Please wait.{nl}I will make it quickly.
Let's go more deep inside. {nl}I hope you can find the one that you are looking for. {nl}
I will go there first so please follow.
Don't come late.
Welcome.
Please receive it.{nl}My devices won't attack you anymore.
I've protected this place for my entire life, but I don't know anything about the revelation which you are looking for.{nl}But, the spirit that lived in the era of Ruklys may know something.
But, those spirits are dangerous.{nl}Since they only have the thoughts of that time. Their hatred towards the kingdom soldiers.
The Soul Stones that read the memories of the spirits are beside me.{nl}I've created them. I've tried to read their memories in the past many times.{nl}
But, what we received in return were only hatred.{nl}For them, we are just kingdom soldiers that are trying to occupy the Fortress of the Great Earth.
It is unfortunate, but to make them not to go crazy, you would need the token of the restraint.
It is very complex to make the token of the restraint.{nl}We've failed that time, but since we have you this time, it will be much easier this time.{nl}
I will tell you in steps, so please first bring the eggs of Rajatad.
The spirits only have the feeling of anger left.{nl}I guess we can't do anything about it.
This egg is the power to restrain.{nl}Now, we need something to execute the power.
To execute the power, the bones of the demons are the best.{nl}When you get the bones, I will move the power of restraint that is in the eggs to the bones of the demons.
Even I failed to pull out the memories of the spirits.{nl}I feel reliable since you are with me.
Well done.{nl}We only have to do the last step in order to complete the token of the restraint.
As I told you before, I've tried to look at the memories of the spirits.{nl}The resistances from the spirits were too aggressive at then, so I failed that time.{nl}
But, now I have you and the token of the restraint.{nl}If we could bring the spirtis, we may able to read the memories with the soul stones that are beside me.
Please bring the spirits here with the token of the restraint.{nl}I will get prepared.
Please bring the spirits fast.{nl}I am also curious.
They are breaking something after receiving an order from Ruklys.{nl}I think that may be related to the revelation of the Goddesses.
I should find out about the device which Ruklys destroyed.

We can look at the detailed memories of the spirits by enhancing the token of the restraint.{nl}Due to enhanced token of the restraint, the spirits would resist. If the spirits resist, suppress them with your power and use the token of the spirit.
I have no choice even if the spirits suffer. {nl}That's the best way I can help you.
Finally found it.{nl}I've been looking for it for 600 years and finally... found the revelation.
Please put the vitality of the monsters into this bone.{nl}Then, the power to restrain, the power to release, and the power to execute, all steps will be put into those.{nl}
That's an old method.{nl}If we complete this, you may able to see the memories of the spirits that were with Ruklys.
Even we if we know the method, it is useless if we can't execute it.{nl}I wasn't able to obtain the vitalities of the monsters...
Good. {nl}That's the token of the restraint.{nl}
Don't care that much even if we use the demons.{nl}What's important is that we should look for the revelation of the Goddess.
Are there spirits that are wandering around the Fortress of the Great Earth without going to the Goddesses?{nl}I can't see them suffering anymore.
I can only help you to make the owl sculptures.{nl}Those owls would guide the spirits that lost their ways.
Can you put the sculptures of the owls at the Fortress of the Great Earth?{nl}If you guide the spirits to the owl sculptures, then you would be able to go beside the Goddesses.
I can't quit carving the owl scuptures.{nl}When I stop carving, then that means the peaceful days have come.
Thanks.{nl}The Goddesses must have given use long lives to fulfill these.
I don't have time to think about those treasures.{nl}I also care for the kingdom. I know that the revelation should not fall into the hands of the demons.{nl}
I should meet Eminent around here.{nl}Let's check with Monocle without being noticed by Eminent.
This is as I thought... He is not like the guardian of the revelation.{nl}Otherwise, are the demons the guardians of the revelation?{nl}
They are going after the revelation.{nl}What should we do about it...{nl}
That's right!{nl}We have that document.
Do you remember?{nl}It's the document that was in the treasure when we went to the hidden place.{nl}

The methods of the activation and the repair of the magic circle is written there to face against the demons at the battle field.{nl}If we somehow use them effectively, we may able to block Eminent.{nl}
First, you do what Eminent tells you to do.{nl}And let's secretly activate the magic circle with me.
Did it go well?{nl}The last thing is near the Ikbeta Platform.{nl}
But, the power of the magic circle is getting suppressed due to the flags of the demons.{nl}I've tried to get near it somehow, but I can't due to the demons.
Let's pull out the demon flags that are near the magic circle.{nl}
Ah, if you go late, Eminent may suspect you.{nl}Go meet Eminent as the magic circle gets activated.
I believe that Ruklys has not colluded with the demons.{nl}If not, what I saw are all lies.
Have you collected all the parts?{nl}Give it to me. I can restore it.
I want you to meet the revelation of the Goddess fast.{nl}To fulfill my lifelong wish...
I will not hide it anymore.{nl}I am Premier Eminent and I used to serve King Kadumel.{nl}
It's up to you to believe, but I want you to give me an opportunity to at least explain this.
I am sure that you know this place is the last battlefield where Ruklys resisted til his death.{nl}And Ruklys was also the guardian of the revelation like his master, Maven.{nl}
But, as the defeat came, he crossed the line which he should've not crossed.{nl}He made an alliance with the demons.{nl}
The Fortress of the Great Earth is full of vicious demons and monsters. {nl}That's why I brought my army here.{nl}
It was a long battle. But the battle ended with my victory.{nl}And then the voices of the Goddess was heard. To protect the revelation.{nl}
But, I don't know how Ruklys hid the revelation.{nl}He is just a half guardian.{nl}
It's up to you to believe this story, but look at me in front of you.{nl}I've been living with the blessing from the Goddesses for the last 600 years.{nl}
And I've met you at the end.{nl}And you pulled me to the place where the revelation is.{nl}
It is my honor since I can be helpful to you. {nl}I was suffering from the sense of shame since I don't know what the half guardian could do.{nl}
Let's finish the explanation here and go look for the revelation of the Goddesses.{nl}I have things to prepare so I will go there first.{nl}
Ah, you still haven't left?{nl}
I've thought about it a lot. {nl}I am sure that the person who've been to this deep is just me among the grave thieves!{nl}
We should record this historic moment.{nl}Can you bring some stones where I could record my achievements?
What should I write on the stones? {nl}If you have any thoughts, please let me know.
I know that it is hard to bring somethig that is that big.{nl}謝謝你. I will think what to write on it.
Isn't this the diary of Ruklys? {nl}I am sure that more than this. Can you look for more?
When you bring this to Wilhelmina Carriot, she will pay you accordingly.
Okay. This is enough.{nl}
The history which we know are all lies. He was killed by the hands of the one he used to love.{nl}Ruklys, he is an unfortunate man.

It's good to see that you are still alive.{nl}Do you remember? When I first looked through this Monocle.{nl}I thought the object is hidden by the special force, but when I went there there were only demons there.{nl}

And when you entered the habitants' area, you've checked it with Monocle right?{nl}The strong force was detected so I remember that I told you to check.{nl}You told me that there is only an old manager there.{nl}
Since then, I've been keep looking for that force with this monocle... {nl}But, when I went to the places, only demons were there.{nl}
Maybe...{nl}The true nature of the force that can be seen by Monocle is maybe... demons?{nl}
That old manager... I have no idea...
I hope my assumptions are wrong.
The demons did not attack Premier Eminent? {nl}
I need to check it. {nl}Let's go together and meet that Eminent guy. {nl}
We will know for sure if you check that guy with the Monockle.
Mirtis is gone but the Vubbes are still following Mirtis's commands. {nl}And there is also a rumor that even stronger and more dangerous Vubbes were seen. {nl}
Most of them died while returning with the prince's men.{nl}But they were not guided by the Goddess even after their death. {nl}
I want to mourn for those who died unfairly. {nl}Would you like to join me?
Chapparition will not bring back the lives of those who died.{nl}It's a sad thing.. But we can't just leave it like that.
What? You're not a reaper? {nl}But since you've seen my face, you will be cursed. {nl}
Huhu. Poor guy. He won't be able to see the light soon. {nl}Whether it's in prison or coffin, only he will know. {nl} I feel sorry for the dead soldiers.
The Legwyn family was a renowned family. {nl}But since Justina's father, Gailius Legwyn disappeared, other members of the family and its deities all fell sick and died. {nl}
The mansion where Justina used to live... is now full of monsters.{nl}
I heard that Erikas who is the friend of Legwyn for a long time has the family treasure of Legwyn family so I barely managed to arrive here...{nl}But, I didn't expect she would behave like this.
So he doesn't even know where the grave of Legwyn family is...{nl}I feel like he is a liar.{nl}
Then we have no choice.{nl}As Erikas said, can you find Legwyn at Mires Grave using the scroll for the dead?{nl}I will stay here so that Erikas would not escape.
So she didn't really tell us the location of Legwyn grave because she doesn't know...?{nl}Didn't she say she would tell you if you give her some money?
The one who woke me up as I was about to go beside the Goddesses... {nl}Okay. Do you need anything from me?{nl}
There was a story behind that. But, what Erikas said is right.{nl}I was chasing after the hunter of Kartas with my subordinates.{nl}But, it was too much for us.{nl}
So I've told Erikas who used to live near there to lend us her power to defeat the hunter of Kartas.{nl}Erikas asked for some collateral in return for lending us the blessed crystal.{nl}
He told me that we would be able to defeat the hunter with that crystal.{nl}But, it was difficult for us to just seal that demon.{nl}We substituted our lives for sealing that demon.
The hunter of Kartas is locked inside the seal in front of you.{nl}The power that is restraining the demon is the blessed crystal that was lended by Erikas.{nl}
The hunter of Kartas will not be able to get out from there if we leave him like that.{nl}But, my daughter... We should look for the famly treasure for Justina who is left alone.{nl}
I can unleash the hunter of Kartas from the seal alone, but{nl}In order to maintain the power of the crystal, we would need help from the subordinates.{nl}
But, I don't want to ask for help to Erikas again...{nl}If you could gather the scent of spirits that are growing on Mochia Hills, I would be able to wake up my subordinates.

When we encountered that demon, someone had to keep concentrating on the crystal.{nl}As each person fell down, we had less number of people to focus on the crystal and the circumstances got worsened.{nl}
Eventually, everyone dedicated their lives to seal the hunter of Kartas.{nl}But, since me and my subordinates don't have bodies, we won't get disturbed.{nl}
I can feel some sacred power within you.{nl}If you could eliminate that demon, we will help.{nl}Please complete the task that we couldn't complete...
There was some pitiful girl that I was taking care of.{nl}She didn't have families and she was so quiet.{nl}
As she started to stay in my mansion, the demons started to appear near the mansion...{nl}
And an incident occured where one of my subordinates was killed by poison. {nl}Of course, everyone suspected that girl.{nl}
Eventually, that girl ran away. {nl}I don't know why, but deep inside my heart, there was some voice echoing to protect her.{nl}
Since we were able to tie up the hunter of Kartas here, she was able to run away safely.{nl}Although, it turned out like this, I don't have any regrets.{nl}
It's not that I did that for good faith.{nl}But, I feel sorry for my family... that they couldn't see Justina.
The scent of the spirits have the power to pull out the memories of the dead.{nl}I will put the power of the scroll of the dead here.{nl}
As you were able to pull me out, you will be able to pull out my subordinates.
My subordinates are sleeping in the pond of Cruva.{nl}I feel sorry that I could not prepare a good spot for their graves.{nl}
You will be able to wake up my subordinates when you rub the scent of spirits onto the stone graves.
I am to blame for it.{nl}They are like family and they are lieing on the ground without avoiding the severe wind...
I am happy to meet my subordinates again because of you,.{nl}Look at their spirits with great determination. They will fulfill our mission even after their deaths.
Let's pull out the hunter of Kartas from now on.{nl}But, the power of the blessed crystal is too strong so there's no way that I could unleash that demon...{nl}
Then, I have no choice, but to use some dirty method.{nl}To weaken the strong sacred power, we need some evil energy.{nl}
Defeat the monsters and bring some Wrongful Teeth.{nl}With that, if we weaken the power of the crystal, that demon would try to come out without knowing that it's a trap.{nl}
And that will be our last chance to eliminate it.
Thanks for helping me this far.{nl}Now, listen to the last wish of the dead...
I can feel some evil energy.{nl}Since I don't want you get dirty, let's finish this quickly.
Place the Wrongful Teeth near the seal. {nl}Then, our last mission will start.
Everything is over...{nl}It is so fortunate that it ended even after our deaths
Thanks. Please pass this crystal to my daughter's friend.{nl}Now, I will return to the Goddesses with my subordinates.{nl}
When you meet my daughter, please tell her that I am so sorry.{nl}And that I love her... please don't forget.
Who is that girl who Legwyn tried to protect til his death?{nl}But, I am sure that he will rest in peace. Since his last mission has been fulfilled.{nl}
Now, I will return this to Erikas.{nl}I really appreciate for your help on behalf of my friend, Justina Legwyn.
I can tell this to you freely.{nl}The keepsakes of Lydia Schaffen... I came out from the Star Tower with my colleagues to protect them.{nl}
The predecessor leader died suspiciously and Ignas became the next leader of the tower of stars.{nl}And then his tyranny started.{nl}
He told everyone that the old rules of Lydia Schaffen should be abondoned and everything should start again...{nl}He told us to eliminate everything that was related to Lydia Schaffen.{nl}

But, Lydia Schaffen was the everything of the Star Tower and she was the symbolic figure of all archers.{nl}After we gained our conciousness, we were running away with our colleagues with the keepsakes.{nl}
Right now... I can hardly move due to the injury.{nl}But, if I stay like this, the chasers would find out about it.
I think we should move.{nl}Can you lure the chasers so that I could go to Guoda Empty Lot?{nl}
When we fire this disposable signal bomb, they will follow you.{nl}I am counting on you...
As you lure them, I will move secretly.{nl}Let's meet at Guoda Empty Lot.
We were able to move safely due to your help.{nl}You seem like a good person so please receive this.{nl}
This is the book recorded about the Roxona Conflict.{nl}I am not sure whether you are interested, but please receive it as a token of my gratitude.
Ah, I came up with a good idea as the chasers ran towards the signal bomb you fired.{nl}I am going to make a trap by attaching signal bomb onto a bomb.{nl}
Then my colleagues would know that I am here...{nl}Maybe, we could also lure the demons.{nl}
To do so, we need to something to make smoke...{nl}But, I've used everything I've had.{nl}
Good. I saw Red Leaves as I ran away. To Ruda trail. {nl}Can you collect those?
Many people left the Star Tower as the tyranny of the leader Ignas continued.{nl}I tried my best to endure, but...
I could not endure when he was trying to eliminate the keepsakes of Lydia Schaffen.
How come I haven't thought about this. {nl}I should have set the traps already...
Lastly... can you put this trap on Ruda Trail across here?{nl}I will hide here until I get recovered.{nl}
My colleagues who were on the same side with me would also be chased by now.{nl}We were to meet at Orsha, but I don't know how far they've come...
How come you have the signal bombs of Irmantas?{nl}You must be either brave or stupid.
Our brothers who were on my side are also being chased at the moment.{nl}We were gonna meet at Orsha, but I don't know how far they've come.
So you are the one who helped Irmantas.{nl}Hmm. Are you that hurt?{nl}
I want to get together with Irmantas, but I am not alright.{nl}We may stop ourselves each other.{nl}
I will go to Orsha from here.{nl}I am sorry, but can you hand this over to him?{nl}Just tell him that it is taken from the Star Tower.
I will leave first.{nl}I've heard that Alina is also wandering around here...{nl}I hope you can find her if possible.
Who are you?{nl}You don't seem to be the chaser of Ignas.{nl}
Ah... You've already met Irmantas and Grazina.{nl}That's good. I have to meet Irmantas right away since I have the words to pass him!
I've seen it for sure.{nl}The demons were among the chasers of Ignas.{nl}They seemed to be close to each other.{nl}
I am sure Ignas has colluded with the demons.{nl}I think eliminating the keepsakes of Lydia Schaffen is a part of that collusion.{nl}
But, I was badly hurt as wel...{nl}I am not sure if I can meet Irmantas again in my life.{nl}
Can you defeat the monsters around here so I can get to him?{nl}If you reduce the number of monsters, then the possibility of getting detected by monsters will be lowered.
At first, I thought the chasers that were following from the Star Tower were subordinates of Ignas.{nl}But, they weren't. There's something we don't know yet!
It noisy around here so I guess the chasers are near.{nl}We should move fast.
If we just stay here, then we would get attacked without notifying anything...{nl}
Please take me to Irmantas.{nl}We have to tell the ones who are following the determination of Lydia Schaffen that they are colluded with the demons!
If only I didn't get this injury, they are easy to defeat...{nl}Where is Irmantas now?
No... I feel like I am going to lose my conciousness if I walk little more.{nl}I feel like I am hearing the voices... of the Goddess.{nl}
After I ran away from the Star Tower, I've never seen a person who is so kind and reliable like you.{nl}If something happens to me... {nl}
Please tell Irmantas about the plot of Iganas with this letter.{nl}
Let's go. {nl}I will cheer myself up a bit.{nl}
What happened?{nl}I think I've heard a some noise from down there...{nl}
Illina... was attacked?{nl}How can Ignas do something without going crazy!{nl}
I will follow the words of Lydia Schaffen on behalf of Illina.{nl}I will arrive at Orsha no matter what takes.{nl}
To you... I want to give you some rewards since you've protected me til the end.{nl}I am sure Illina and Lydia Schaffen also want me to do that.
Please feed that black herb to Agatas.{nl}As it gets detoxified, the weak body of a human will suffer severe pains, but that will be better than dying.{nl}
Go your way after saving the life of Agatas.{nl}In the name of the Demon Lord, Hauberk, I will never forget you since you've saved my contractor.
You are the one with a strong spirit.{nl}When they rushed in, I thought my revenge towards Giltine has ended.{nl}
They followed here to obtain the power of my spirit.{nl}You and Agastas will be in danger...
I think Agatas would not gain the conciousness for a while...{nl}For this innocent human and yourself, I want you to do something.{nl}
I have a way to eliminate the head of the demons.{nl}Please take care of the piece of my spirit which Agatas has for a while.{nl}
In order to move my spirit piece, I need the crystal that possesses the demonic energy.{nl}Please get the shadow essence from the demons at Pakavi fields.
With that power, I will be with you.
I can't quit this journey.{nl}Only I can eliminate Giltine and her subordinates from this world.{nl}
As you ripped me off, I will get a revenge on them...
This will be enough.{nl}I promise to you. If you help me, I will fight against the demons for the Goddesses and the humans.{nl}
If you hate the demons, then you can trust me.{nl}The ones who've been betrayed will never forget.{nl}
When the spirit was ripped in pieces, I decided myself.{nl}If I would have to look for my spirit for thousands of years, I will never forget them...
The power of the spirit if gradually recovering with the demonic power.{nl}The knowledge I've forgotten is gradually coming back.{nl}
The head of the ones who are chasing me should be looking for me now.{nl}For the start of the new journey, I will make them feel the fear of the ones who are being chased...
Defeat the demons using the power of my soul stone.{nl}If you defeat them, I will use them as the source to call out my subordinates.{nl}
Please find my hidden spirit from the unoccupied grave at Badova Highway.{nl}I couldn't be with Agatas, but it will be possible if I am with you...
To get a revenge on the ones who are chasing me, I have to put him in danger.{nl}He must be hiding somewhere and looking at me.{nl}
Is he still confident?...{nl}Or does he feel fear since I am with a competent individual like you.
This will be enough.{nl}Now is the time to find my ripped spirit again!
Let's go to Salaisvin Wilderness.{nl}If I could only combine the pieces of my spirit, I would be able to put the guy who is chasing me into a danger.
If you are afraid that I would betray you after my spirits are combined again, please receive my soul stone.{nl}If I am about to hurt you, destroy it...{nl}
But, I promise. {nl}That would never happen.
1st Page of the Roxona Conflict

Lydia Schaffen was a master of archery.{nl}She could even hit the feelers of a small insect.{nl}She stood in front of the great knight Ruklys.{nl}She held her breath and slowly drew her bow.{nl}It wasn't that long ago when Lydia Schaffen stood against Ruklys who used to be her lover.{nl}

It was a day in the winter time.{nl}The tyranny of Kadumel King started getting extreme.{nl}Never-ending labor, starving people, corrupted landlords and a violent king...{nl}Ruklys could not stand what he was seeing in the kingdom.{nl}Revolt.{nl}Everyone in Roxona believed that Ruklys will win.{nl}

The spring had come and Ruklys was still in high spirits.{nl}Ruklys obtained the information that there was a village where the thieves who'd collided with the kingdom soldiers are living.{nl}The soldiers were so corrupted...{nl}Ruklys decided to attack the village with his subordinates.{nl}

He was just fighting against the thieves, but some unknown tension made Ruklys to hold his sword more firmly.{nl}A few of his colleagues fell down with the blood bursting out from their chests.{nl}At the same time, Ruklys and his subordinates ran towards the village.{nl}They didn't need to horn the pipe to let everyone know the battle has started.{nl}

They possessed a decent level of archery and martial arts.{nl}The doubts which Ruklys had in his mind also disappeared.{nl}It was certain that they were not normal thieves...{nl}Ruklys held his sword on his other hand.{nl}He noticed something strange as the time passed by, but that was after many people died.{nl}In the darkness, the battle continued.{nl}Ruklys managed to win the battle at the end, but he felt somewhat uncomfortable.{nl}Long after the battle, he found out that the village was the hometown of Lydia Schaffen.
The ones who've been betrayed would never forget about anything.{nl}
Many things which I've forgotten have become mine.{nl}But, don't worry.{nl}You are the companion of my journey.{nl}
Please return my soul stone. {nl}I will get prepared to summon my subordinates.{nl}
Let's defeat the leader with me.{nl}The shadow essences which you've collected told me that he is hidden in Paskavi Fields.{nl}
Pull him out!{nl}I will be with you soon.
If you are afraid, you could give up. I will complete the betrayal alone.{nl}I just hope that my contractor would not be hurt again...
Thanks for fighting with me, companion.{nl}I will be with you when you and your colleagues fall into great pains and danger.
Agatas carried out the contract diligently.{nl}I will leave him and start the journey of the revenge.{nl}
The pieces of me that are spreaded all over this world...{nl}They will become one spirit with me some day.{nl}
If you meet them on your journey, please help them.{nl}My spirits will rely on you.
This is the reward for the contract I've made with Agatas.{nl}Please put that in his pocket.{nl}
Farewell, companion.{nl}I will never forget you.
I will look for whereabouts of my other spirits here.{nl}Companion, we will meet again.
I've put the spirit seperation potion{nl}into my pocket.
Oh, you're here. {nl}Let's trace back what was seen in the soul's memory. {nl}If we could revive the Ruklys's device, then it will guide us to the revelation.
I know where the device of Ruklys is but we need its parts to fix it. {nl}I will check on the left side so you check on the right.
We'll need the parts to repair the device. {nl}Look for it on the right side.
You're here? {nl}What did Eminent say? {nl}
Good thing he doesn't seem to find anything suspicious. {nl}We must not give any parts to Eminent until the magic circle of Ruklys is activated.
I figured the location of the magic circle as written in the document. {nl}
First, the magic circle under Slypti Watchtower. {nl}The writings on the pole were erased so the magic circle is not working. {nl}
It will work when you write on it again. {nl}I'll take care of the magic circle below so I'll leave this to you.
Be sure not to be caught by Eminent.
I saw the magic circles activate. Are you ok? {nl}What about Eminent? {nl}
You defeated Eminent and obtained the revelation? {nl}Wow, you're way better than I thought... {nl}
Anyway, I also feel like I've helped bring peace to the world and it beats my heart. {nl}But I still have some work to do. You know, right?
